T02TD1785E:1b-1: pra d'i po dyo ta na n'a ma t'i k'a /
T02TD1785E:1b-3: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa /
T02TD1785E:1b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung gi mnga' bdag [dd] 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1785E:1b-5: dpal ldan rgyud rgyal rnal 'byor rgyud kyi shin tu gsal bar rnam phye legs bshad pa //
T02TD1785E:1b-6: mtha' drug gi ni 'ching bas bcings pa rgyal sras yul 'gyur rgyal ba'i 'dus gang yin //
T02TD1785E:1b-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi rim gnyis gnas kyis rgyas btab de ni klu sgrub las rnyed pa //
T02TD1785E:1b-8: khyab bdag dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar btud de zla ba grags pas rim bzhin bshad //
T02TD1785E:1b-9: gsang sngags sku ni rab sgrub byed //
T02TD1785E:1b-10: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang po yin //
T02TD1785E:1b-11: sems la dmigs pa tsam zhig ni //
T02TD1785E:1b-12: rim pa gnyis pa zhes brjod do //
T02TD1785E:1b-13: kun rdzob bden pa bstan pa ni //
T02TD1785E:1b-15: kun rdzob bden pa dag pa ni //
T02TD1785E:1b-16: rim pa bzhi pa zhes pa brjod do //
T02TD1785E:1b-17: bden gnyis sbyor ba gang yin pa //
T02TD1785E:1b-18: zung 'jug ces bya lnga pa ste //
T02TD1785E:1b-19: 'di ni bsgrub pa'i yan lag mchog / rgyud kun gyi ni don bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1785E:1b-20: rim pa 'di yi dbye ba yang //
T02TD1785E:2a-2: de rnams yang dag bsdus pa ni //
T02TD1785E:2a-3: gang gis shes pa rgyud rig de //
T02TD1785E:2a-4: sngags dang sems dang lus dang ni //
T02TD1785E:2a-5: rnam dag dang ni zung 'jug pa //
T02TD1785E:2a-6: rim pa lnga yis bsdus pa'i don //
T02TD1785E:2a-7: shes nas mtha' drug la 'jug go //
T02TD1785E:2a-8: ji srid ya ra la ha'i bar //
T02TD1785E:2a-9: ka kha gha mtha' na dza'i mtha' //
T02TD1785E:2a-10: da dha'i mtha' dang ma mtha' bcas //
T02TD1785E:2a-11: de de'i rtsa ba yi ge gsum //
T02TD1785E:2a-12: thub pa chen po'i chos phung po //
T02TD1785E:2a-13: brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs pa yi //
T02TD1785E:2a-15: de bas de ni rgyud kyi rtse //
T02TD1785E:2a-16: gzhung nyung ba la don mang ba //
T02TD1785E:2a-17: 'dus pa'i rgyud ni rnyed dka' zhing //
T02TD1785E:2a-18: rgyan bdun rtogs par dka' bas na //
T02TD1785E:2a-19: thams cad du ni rnam par 'khor //
T02TD1785E:2a-20: de bas bla ma'i dka' drin gyis //
T02TD1785E:2a-21: 'bad de rnam par shes nas ni //
T02TD1785E:2a-22: sems can rjes gzung 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1785E:2a-23: de yi rnam par dbye bar bya //
T02TD1785E:2a-24: gling bslang ba yi grangs ni lnga //
T02TD1785E:2a-25: tshul ni rnam pa bzhi yin la //
T02TD1785E:2a-26: rgyas bshad mtha' ni rnam pa drug / bshad pa yang ni rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1785E:2a-27: lnga pa'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD1785E:2a-28: drug pa'i dbye ba lnga dang ldan //
T02TD1785E:2a-29: bdun pa'i dbye ba rnam gnyis te //
T02TD1785E:2a-30: rgyan rnams mdor ru bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1785E:2a-31: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD1785E:2a-32: rgyan ni bdun po rnams kyi ni //
T02TD1785E:2a-33: rim bzhin du ni re re yis //
T02TD1785E:2a-34: bstan pa dag ni bdag gis bya //
T02TD1785E:2a-35: rgyud 'di'i ming ni ci zhig yin //
T02TD1785E:2b-0: gang gi don du 'di @2b nyid mdzad //
T02TD1785E:2b-1: su zhig byed po 'di'i tshad gang //
T02TD1785E:2b-2: 'di yi dgos pa'ang ci zhig yin //
T02TD1785E:2b-3: rgyud kyi mtshan ni ming yin la //
T02TD1785E:2b-4: skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
T02TD1785E:2b-5: 'di yi byed po rdo rje sems //
T02TD1785E:2b-6: tshad dag kyang ni bshad bya ste //
T02TD1785E:2b-7: le'u de bzhin cho ga dang //
T02TD1785E:2b-8: dum bu de bzhin rim par byed //
T02TD1785E:2b-9: de ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te ;
T02TD1785E:2b-10: / gzhung nyid kyi ni grangs kyang ngo //
T02TD1785E:2b-11: dgos pa yang ni bshad bya ste //
T02TD1785E:2b-12: zhi sogs bya ba'i cho ga dang //
T02TD1785E:2b-13: de bzhin grub pa brgyad dang ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-14: sangs rgyas kyang ni mchog yin no //
T02TD1785E:2b-15: gleng bslang ba ni 'das zin te //
T02TD1785E:2b-16: gnyis pa yang ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1785E:2b-17: rgyud dag dang ni gleng gzhi dad //
T02TD1785E:2b-18: nges pa'i tshig dang rgyu yin no //
T02TD1785E:2b-19: mi yi skye bar 'khrungs pa ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-20: rgyud ces bya ba yin par brjod //
T02TD1785E:2b-21: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-22: nges par 'byung ba gleng gzhi yin //
T02TD1785E:2b-23: 'dul las sdom pa bstan pa ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-24: nges pa'i tshig ces bshad par bya //
T02TD1785E:2b-26: de ni rgyu zhes brjod bya ste //
T02TD1785E:2b-28: tshul ni rnam pa bzhir 'dod do //
T02TD1785E:2b-29: 'dod chags chos kyi tshul gyis ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-30: don gsal rtogs phyir bshad par bya //
T02TD1785E:2b-31: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed pa ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-32: rgyud ces bya ba yin par brjod //
T02TD1785E:2b-33: slar yang rigs gcig gyur pa ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-34: gleng gzhi yin par rab tu bstan //
T02TD1785E:2b-35: rdo rje la sogs gzung ba nyid //
T02TD1785E:2b-36: nges pa'i tshig ni yin par bshad //
T02TD1785E:2b-37: sgeg pa la sogs spyod pa ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-38: rgyu zhes bya ba yin par bshad //
T02TD1785E:2b-39: rgyan ni gsum pa nyid kyang ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-40: rnal 'byor rgyud tshul las bshad pa'i //
T02TD1785E:2b-41: mtha' drug tshig gis nges byas pa //
T02TD1785E:2b-42: rgyas btab don ni rab rtogs bya //
T02TD1785E:2b-43: drang ba dang ni nges don bcas //
T02TD1785E:2b-44: dgongs pas bshad dang dgongs min dang //
T02TD1785E:2b-45: ji bzhin sgra dang ma yin te //
T02TD1785E:2b-46: mtha' ni drug tu shes par byas //
T02TD1785E:2b-47: skal ngan rnams la rgyal ba yis //
T02TD1785E:2b-48: sbas te bshad ba drang ba'i don //
T02TD1785E:2b-49: yang dag don ni rab ston phyir //
T02TD1785E:2b-50: nges pa'i don yang gsungs pa yin //
T02TD1785E:2b-51: mchog 'dod sems can rnams kyi phyir //
T02TD1785E:2b-52: chos kyi de nyid rab ston pa //
T02TD1785E:2b-53: 'gal ba'i tshig gi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1785E:2b-54: gsungs pa gang yin dgongs bshad de //
T02TD1785E:2b-55: dbang po dman pa'i sems can rnams //
T02TD1785E:2b-56: rtogs phyir mchog tu gsal ba yis //
T02TD1785E:2b-57: de nyid nges par ston pa ni //
T02TD1785E:2b-58: dgongs pa min pas bshad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:2b-59: dkyil 'khor sogs dang chog zhib la //
T02TD1785E:3a-2: don rgyas bshad pa gang yin pa //
T02TD1785E:3a-3: de ni ji bzhin sgrar gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:3a-4: ko t'a khya la sogs pa'i sgra //
T02TD1785E:3a-5: 'jig rten bstan bcos la med cing //
T02TD1785E:3a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i brdar gyur pa //
T02TD1785E:3a-7: de ni ji bzhin min par bsgrags //
T02TD1785E:3a-8: mtha' drug dbye ba bstan na sa ni //
T02TD1785E:3a-9: bshad pa'i dbye ba brjod par bya //
T02TD1785E:3a-10: tshig gi don dang spyi yi don //
T02TD1785E:3a-11: sbas dang de bzhin mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD1785E:3a-12: dang po gcig pu kho na nyid //
T02TD1785E:3a-13: spyi yi don gyi dbye ba gnyis //
T02TD1785E:3a-14: sbas ba rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02TD1785E:3a-15: mthar thug pa ni rnam pa gnyis //
T02TD1785E:3a-16: sgra tsam la ni rab gzhol ba'i //
T02TD1785E:3a-17: phyi rol bstan bcos mkhas pa yis //
T02TD1785E:3a-18: de yi bkod pas rab bstan pa //
T02TD1785E:3a-19: yi ge'i don ni yin par bshad //
T02TD1785E:3a-20: mdo sogs la ni rab bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD1785E:3a-21: 'gyod pa zlog par byed pa dang //
T02TD1785E:3a-22: bskyed pa'i rim dang ldan pa dag / spyi yi don ni yin par gsungs //
T02TD1785E:3a-23: 'dod chags chos ni rab ston don //
T02TD1785E:3a-24: kun rdzob bden pa rtogs pa dang //
T02TD1785E:3a-25: ye shes gsum po rnams brtags pa'i //
T02TD1785E:3a-26: snying po yod pas sbas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:3a-27: 'od gsal ba ni rab ston dang //
T02TD1785E:3a-28: zung du 'jug pa rtog pa ste //
T02TD1785E:3a-29: rnam pa gnyis su mtha' bshad de //
T02TD1785E:3a-30: mtha' ni mur thug pa yi tshig /'chad pas nyan par 'dod pa la //
T02TD1785E:3a-31: dbye ba yang ni gnyis yod de ;
T02TD1785E:3a-32: / tshogs la bshad par bstan pa dang //
T02TD1785E:3a-33: gnyis pa slob ma la bshad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:3a-34: ji bzhin sgra dang dgongs min dang //
T02TD1785E:3a-35: drang ba'i don du'ang gang gyur dang //
T02TD1785E:3a-36: yi ge'i don dang spyi yi don //
T02TD1785E:3a-37: tshogs pa la bshad yin par brjod //
T02TD1785E:3a-38: ji bzhin min sgra nges don dang //
T02TD1785E:3a-39: de bzhin dgongs te bshad pa dang ;
T02TD1785E:3a-40: / sbas dang mthar thug pa rnams ni //
T02TD1785E:3a-41: slob ma la ni bshad par 'dod //
T02TD1785E:3a-42: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD1785E:3a-43: bde gshegs rnams kyis gdul bya la //
T02TD1785E:3a-44: rim pa gnyis la brten nas ni //
T02TD1785E:3a-45: bshad pa'i dbye ba gsungs pa yin //
T02TD1785E:3a-46: rnam pa kun tu nyan 'dod pa'i //
T02TD1785E:3a-47: 'jig rten nges par gyur pa ni //
T02TD1785E:3a-48: blo yi rnam pa dpag med las //
T02TD1785E:3a-49: gang zag rnam pa lngar 'dod do //
T02TD1785E:3a-52: rang bzhin tha dad ming gis de //
T02TD1785E:3a-53: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin //
T02TD1785E:3a-54: de ni ma lus thos gyur la //
T02TD1785E:3a-55: 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
T02TD1785E:3b-0: skad cig @3b gis ni brjod 'gyur ba //
T02TD1785E:3b-1: autpala zhes bya'i gang zag go //
T02TD1785E:3b-2: gzung bya mang du thos gyur kyang //
T02TD1785E:3b-3: ston pa yi ni nus med pa //
T02TD1785E:3b-4: bum pa'i ras bal sa bon 'dra //
T02TD1785E:3b-5: pad dkar zhes bya'i gang zag go //
T02TD1785E:3b-6: dad dang ldan zhing snying rje shes //
T02TD1785E:3b-7: thos na blo yi kha 'bye la //
T02TD1785E:3b-9: padma zhes bya'i gang zag go //
T02TD1785E:3b-10: thos pa nyung zhing nga rgyal ldan //
T02TD1785E:3b-11: rtsa ba med par mang du smra //
T02TD1785E:3b-12: rjes su gzung bar mi nus pa //
T02TD1785E:3b-13: tsandan zhes bya'i gang zag go //
T02TD1785E:3b-14: tshul khrims dag cing mkhas la sgrin //
T02TD1785E:3b-15: shes rab ldan zhing rgyud gcig pa //
T02TD1785E:3b-16: thos nas legs par ston pa ni //
T02TD1785E:3b-17: rin chen zhes bya'i gang zag go //
T02TD1785E:3b-18: autpala de bzhin pad dkar dang //
T02TD1785E:3b-20: gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni //
T02TD1785E:3b-21: tshogs pa la bshad gang zag go //
T02TD1785E:3b-22: rdzogs pa'i rim gyi skal ldan zhing //
T02TD1785E:3b-23: rtag tu spyod pas rnam brgyan pa //
T02TD1785E:3b-24: 'di ni rin chen gang zag ste //
T02TD1785E:3b-25: slob ma la bshad snod yin no //
T02TD1785E:3b-26: gang zag zhes pa'i dbye ba yis //
T02TD1785E:3b-27: snod dang snod min yongs brtags nas //
T02TD1785E:3b-28: rdo rje slob dpon / mkhas pas ni //
T02TD1785E:3b-29: bshad pa rnam pa gnyis bya'o //
T02TD1785E:3b-30: rgyan ni drug po de rnams kyis //
T02TD1785E:3b-31: bden gnyis rnam par nges byas pa //
T02TD1785E:3b-32: de ni rgyan gyur bdun pa ste //
T02TD1785E:3b-33: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgrub pa'o //
T02TD1785E:3b-34: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD1785E:3b-35: bshad smra shin tu rnyed par dka' //
T02TD1785E:3b-36: 'di ltar drangs te bshad pa ni //
T02TD1785E:3b-37: rnal 'byor rgyud las gzhan na min //
T02TD1785E:3b-38: de bas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02TD1785E:3b-39: gleng gzhi rim pa'i sbyor bar bcas //
T02TD1785E:3b-40: bshad pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa yis //
T02TD1785E:3b-42: rgyan rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i rig pa'o //
T02TD1785E:3b-43: da ni le'u bcu bdun gyi bsdus pa'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1785E:3b-44: de la le'u dang po las ni brjod pa dang /
T02TD1785E:3b-45: brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor du nyan pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la //
T02TD1785E:3b-46: rigs pa'i dbang bskur ba byin nas /
T02TD1785E:3b-47: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gyi bye brag gis brtag pa dang /
T02TD1785E:3b-48: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis so sor ston cing /
T02TD1785E:3b-49: 'og nas bshad pa'i le'u bcu drug po'i don gzhan dag kyang rnyed pas /
T02TD1785E:3b-50: lha'i rnal 'byor gnyis po nyid la 'jug cing gnas pa ste /
T02TD1785E:4a-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
T02TD1785E:4a-3: rim pa gnyis la yang dag gnas //
T02TD1785E:4a-4: bskyed pa yi ni rim pa dang //
T02TD1785E:4a-5: rdzogs pa yi ni rim nyid do //
T02TD1785E:4a-7: de la le'u gnyis pa las ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'ba' zhig nye bar ston to //
T02TD1785E:4a-8: le'u gsum pa las ni yongs su dag pa lha'i rnal 'byor gsal bar byed do //
T02TD1785E:4a-9: le'u bzhi pa las ni dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ston to //
T02TD1785E:4a-10: le'u lnga pa las ni rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-11: le'u drug pa las ni sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-12: le'u bdun pa las ni le'u lnga pa las bshad pa'i spyod pa spros nas bstan to //
T02TD1785E:4a-13: le'u brgyad pa las ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-14: le'u brgyad pa las ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-15: le'u dgu pa las ni rmad du byung ba'i lung bstan pa gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-16: le'u bcu pa las ni mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub mngon du bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD1785E:4a-17: phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can gyi lha'i snying po bskul ba gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-18: le'u bcu gcig pa las ni sngags kyi sku bskyed pa dang /
T02TD1785E:4a-19: ye shes kyi sku bskyed pa ston to //
T02TD1785E:4a-20: le'u bcu gnyis pa las ni phyag rgya chen po yongs su thim pa gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-21: le'u bcu gsum ba dang bcu bzhi pa las ni las kyi tshogs rnams gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-22: le'u bco lnga pa las ni dngos grub thams cad ni /
T02TD1785E:4a-23: de kho na nyid rtogs pa nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:4a-24: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-25: le'u bcu drug pa las ni le'u bzhi pa las dkyil 'khor gsungs pa'i rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor spros te gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:4a-26: le'u bcu bdun pa las ni dam tshig dang sdom pa rab tu ston pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:4a-27: da ni le'u bcu bdun po rnams kyi mtha' drug tu tshig rnam par dbye ba dang /
T02TD1785E:4a-28: bshad pa rnam par dbye ba bya sde /
T02TD1785E:4a-29: 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD1785E:4a-30: bha ga la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ni /
T02TD1785E:4a-31: bshad pa'i tshul rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par bshad do //
T02TD1785E:4a-32: brjod kyis mi lang ba'i zhes bya ba'i 'khor nas brtsams te /
T02TD1785E:4b-0: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la zhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ni drang ba'i don dang @4b nges pa'i don no //
T02TD1785E:4b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-2: ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-3: sku dang gsung dang thugs slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
T02TD1785E:4b-4: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-5: dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-6: rin po cha 'byung ba'i rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-7: 'od chen po 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-8: gdon mi za ba'i mchog dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
T02TD1785E:4b-9: rdo rje 'dzin mnyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-11: 'dod chags 'dzin pa rjes su chags par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-12: rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-14: chos rin po che 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-15: sku gsung thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:4b-16: sku gsung thugs gsang ba zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-18: rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig ni tshul rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
T02TD1785E:4b-19: rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1785E:4b-20: mchod pa spros par gyur pa'i dam tshig rin po che'i sprin zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:4b-23: byang chub sems ni rab byung ba //
T02TD1785E:4b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
T02TD1785E:4b-25: rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o //
T02TD1785E:4b-27: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:4b-28: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so legs so 'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na zhes bya ba nas //
T02TD1785E:4b-29: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de zhes bya ba'i bar du ni dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:4b-30: zhes sdang gi rigs zhes bya ba nas //
T02TD1785E:5a-1: bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i par dang /
T02TD1785E:5a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' phyung ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD1785E:5a-3: khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor phyung ba'i bar du ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:5a-4: badzra dhrika / dzi na dzi ka / ratna dhri ka / a'a ro li ka / pradzny'a dhri ka / dve sha ra ti /
T02TD1785E:5a-12: ces bya ba'i sngags kyi tshig rnams nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u zhes bya ba'i bar ni drang ba dang nges pa'i don te //
T02TD1785E:5a-13: le'u dang po la mtha' rnam pa drug gis tshig rnam par dbye pa bstan zin to //
T02TD1785E:5a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD1785E:5a-15: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa yang thugs kyis mkhyen nas /
T02TD1785E:5a-16: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD1785E:5a-17: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:5a-18: khyed kyis sems lus lta bu dang //
T02TD1785E:5a-19: zhes bya ba nas skyed cig / ces bya ba'i bar du ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:5a-20: ae ma ho kun tu bzang po yi //
T02TD1785E:5a-21: sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1785E:5a-22: skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02TD1785E:5a-23: skye ba 'di ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1785E:5a-24: zhes bya ba'i ched du brjod pa ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:5a-25: dngos po med pas bsgom pa med //
T02TD1785E:5a-26: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i byang chub kyi sems kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni rnams pa bzhi'i tshul gyis bshad do //
T02TD1785E:5a-27: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba //
T02TD1785E:5a-28: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
T02TD1785E:5a-29: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1785E:5a-30: chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas //

T02TD1785E:5a-32: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1785E:5a-34: byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1785E:5a-35: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //

T02TD1785E:5a-39: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don to //

T02TD1785E:5a-43: zhes bya ba'i bar du ni rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis bshad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:5b-0: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi @5b dbus gnas par //
T02TD1785E:5b-1: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //

T02TD1785E:5b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD1785E:5b-9: dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1785E:5b-10: zhes bya ba'i bar ni dgongs pa ma yin pa'o //

T02TD1785E:8a-8: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ni mtha' rnam pa 'di drug tu nges pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:8a-9: rim pa 'di nyid kyis na bzhugs pa'i tshig nas brtsams te /
T02TD1785E:8a-10: mtha' rnam pa drug tu bshad pa dang /
T02TD1785E:8a-11: rnam pa bzhir bshad pa 'dis gsang ba 'dus pa'i don rgyas btab pa yin la /
T02TD1785E:8a-12: de ma rtogs par ji bzhin bar bshad pa'i sgra'i don tsam la brten te /
T02TD1785E:8a-13: yul rnams la chags pa'i sems can rnams 'gal ba dang shin tu rmad du gyur pa'i bya ba byed pas las kyi dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1785E:8a-14: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i rgyud las ji skad du bshad pa ste /
T02TD1785E:8a-15: gsang pa'i bdag po don rgyas pa'i //
T02TD1785E:8a-16: tshul chen 'di ni rnyed gyur nas //
T02TD1785E:8a-17: ji bzhin don ni rnyed bzung bas //
T02TD1785E:8a-18: des na lam dan dag tu lhung //
T02TD1785E:8a-19: mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtag dga' bas //
T02TD1785E:8a-20: rab tu dga' dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1785E:8a-21: rnal 'byor pa ni bdag ces smra //
T02TD1785E:8a-22: chos ni g-yo yis byad par 'gyur//
T02TD1785E:8a-23: des ni 'dus pa mi shes par //
T02TD1785E:8a-24: dam tshig la sogs spyod byed la //
T02TD1785E:8a-25: gsang ba srung bar mi byed cing //
T02TD1785E:8a-26: thams cad du ni rab tu ston //
T02TD1785E:8a-27: mngon sum sangs rgyas 'dra ba yi //
T02TD1785E:8a-28: slob dpon smod cing bkur mi byed //
T02TD1785E:8a-29: skad cig gis ni khong khro zhing //
T02TD1785E:8a-30: de bzhin skad cig gis rjes chags//
T02TD1785E:8a-31: ma dang sring mo bu mo ste //
T02TD1785E:8a-32: bgrod min la ni 'gro ba dang //
T02TD1785E:8a-33: pha ma gsod cing de bzhin du //
T02TD1785E:8a-34: srog chags gzhan rnams gsod par byed //
T02TD1785E:8a-35: de bzhin brdzun gyi tshig smra zhing //
T02TD1785E:8a-36: khyad par du yang rku bar byed //
T02TD1785E:8a-37: gzhan gyi chung ma'i thad 'gro zhing //
T02TD1785E:8a-38: smad pa gzhan yang byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1785E:8a-39: de nyid ye shes 'byung ba yi //
T02TD1785E:8a-40: dam tshig rnams ni des mi shes //
T02TD1785E:8a-41: nyes pa cung zad tsam la yang //
T02TD1785E:8a-42: mngon spyod dag ni byed 'gyur la //
T02TD1785E:8a-43: rnal 'byor rab sbyor dman pa yi //
T02TD1785E:8a-45: rtag tu phyi rol bstan bcos dga' //
T02TD1785E:8b-0: de yi @8b sbyor la mkhas pa dang //
T02TD1785E:8b-1: rang gi dam tshig yongs spangs te //
T02TD1785E:8b-2: lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod //
T02TD1785E:8b-3: sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1785E:8b-4: 'tsho ba dag ni des sgrub byed //
T02TD1785E:8b-5: gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar //
T02TD1785E:8b-7: de rnams gzung bar bya ba'i phyir//
T02TD1785E:8b-8: gsang ba dgongs pas bshad pa yin //
T02TD1785E:8b-10: 'di ni bsdus pa'i don bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:8b-11: de ltar bsdus pa'i don bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:8b-12: da ni yan lag gi don rnam par dbye ba'i phyir rgyud la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1785E:8b-13: 'dir sdud par byed pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes ji skad du thos pa thugs la bzhag nas gdul bya rnams la bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:8b-14: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD1785E:8b-15: 'di skad ces bya ba ni rgyud kyi don ma lus par ston pa'i tshig gi phrad do //
T02TD1785E:8b-16: bdag gis thos zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du thos kyi gzhan dag las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa ma yin pa dang rtogs pa ma yin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:8b-17: dus gcig ces pa ni dus gcig gi tshe na 'di thos la gzhan du ni gzhan dag thos pa'o //
T02TD1785E:8b-18: yang na gzhan du 'di ni ma thos pa'o //
T02TD1785E:8b-19: yang na dus gcig ste skad cig ma gcig la'o//
T02TD1785E:8b-21: gsum po 'di dag gis ni bdag nyid thos pa mang ba dang /
T02TD1785E:8b-22: rgyud rnyed par dka' ba dang /
T02TD1785E:8b-23: shes rab phul du byung ba yin par rab tu ston to //
T02TD1785E:8b-26: gang dang lhan cig thos zhes glang gzhi bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:8b-27: bcom ldan 'das zhes pas ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa yin te /
T02TD1785E:8b-28: skal ba phun sum tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02TD1785E:8b-29: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma lus par bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD1785E:8b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD1785E:8b-31: gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa yin te /
T02TD1785E:8b-32: de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa nas /
T02TD1785E:8b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02TD1785E:9a-0: bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag @9a * //
T02TD1785E:9a-2: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la /
T02TD1785E:9a-3: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po yang yin bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1785E:9a-4: de'i rdo rje btsun mo ni shes rab chen po ste /
T02TD1785E:9a-5: de nyid ni nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pas na bha ga'o //
T02TD1785E:9a-6: der bzhugs pa ni gnas par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:9a-13: bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na /
T02TD1785E:9a-14: ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhal yas khang gi nang na bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:9a-15: zhes bya ba ni yi ge'i don to //
T02TD1785E:9a-18: dgos pa gang gis na sdud par byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rab rnams la 'di skad bdag gis zhes ston par byed /
T02TD1785E:9a-19: 'di dag bdag gis zhe'am 'di bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang ston par nus pa nyid yin no //
T02TD1785E:9a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brdar gyur pas shes rab dang thabs ston pa nyid kyis na gsung rab kyi dad por nges par brjod dgos so //
T02TD1785E:9a-23: gal te de lta na ni sdud par byed pa med par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:9a-24: des na bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig 'brel pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1785E:9a-26: de ni bden te 'dir sdud par byed pa ni med do //
T02TD1785E:9a-28: 'o na btsun pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa sdud par byed pa ci'i phyir 'jig rten du grags /
T02TD1785E:9a-30: kun dga' bo ni 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzad po ste phyag na rdo rje yin la /
T02TD1785E:9a-31: rdo rje 'chang chen po yang de nyid las gzhan ma yin te /
T02TD1785E:9a-32: gzhan du na mdo ste la sogs pa chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong po 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa las phyag na rdo rjes thos nas lhag chad med par lan gcig gis 'dzin par ga la nus /
T02TD1785E:9a-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di nyid thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:9b-0: de nas gzhan yang @9b thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:9b-2: 'jam dpal ni rgyal po chen po zas gtsang mar gyur to //
T02TD1785E:9b-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug ni lha mo chen mo sgyu 'phrul du gyur to //
T02TD1785E:9b-4: dpal lha mo ni grags 'dzin no //
T02TD1785E:9b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' ni sgra gcan 'dzin no //
T02TD1785E:9b-6: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ni sh'a ri'i bu'o //
T02TD1785E:9b-7: kun du bzang po ni gnas brtan kun dga' bor gyur to //
T02TD1785E:9b-8: lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni gnas brtan lha sbyin no //
T02TD1785E:9b-9: rnam par snang mdzad chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal sh'akya thub par gyur to //
T02TD1785E:9b-10: rig pa 'dis na bsdus par byed pa zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1785E:9b-11: 'khor zhes bya ba ni las dang po pa'i sems can rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:9b-12: sangs rgyas kyi rol mo 'di bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:9b-14: sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
T02TD1785E:9b-15: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1785E:9b-16: sems can rnams ni gdul bya'i phyir //
T02TD1785E:9b-17: mya ngan 'das pa nye bar ston //
T02TD1785E:9b-19: de bas na 'di skad ces bya ba'i yi ge gnyis ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid yin par nges so //
T02TD1785E:9b-20: de dag kyang gang las shes zhe na /
T02TD1785E:9b-22: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis lha'i dbang pos zhus pa las gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:9b-25: gang phyir dang po rab tu sbyar //
T02TD1785E:9b-26: 'di ci bde gshegs gsung yin nam //
T02TD1785E:9b-27: nyan thos kyis bshad yin nam ci //
T02TD1785E:9b-28: bdag gi som nyi 'di dag kun //
T02TD1785E:9b-29: srid mthar phyin pas bsal du gsol //
T02TD1785E:9b-30: dam chos yon tan smra ba yis //
T02TD1785E:9b-31: lha yi dbang po'i tshig gsan nas //
T02TD1785E:9b-32: de nas legs so zhes sbyin te //
T02TD1785E:9b-34: gang phyir thams cad gzigs pa yis //
T02TD1785E:9b-35: dang por 'di skad ces gsungs pa //
T02TD1785E:9b-36: de ni go rims ji bzhin du //
T02TD1785E:9b-37: lha yi dbang pos mnyan par bgyi//
T02TD1785E:9b-38: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang //
T02TD1785E:9b-39: bzhi stong gi ni grangs rnyed kyi //
T02TD1785E:9b-40: kun gyi bzhi dang pham ni //
T02TD1785E:9b-41: yi ge gnyis su de bzhin bstan //
T02TD1785E:9b-42: yi ge ae ni mar gyur la //
T02TD1785E:9b-43: wa ni pha zhes bya bar grags //
T02TD1785E:9b-44: thig le der ni sbyor ba ste //
T02TD1785E:9b-45: sbyor te shin tu rmad byung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:10a-2: / wa ni rdo rje nyid yin no //
T02TD1785E:10a-3: thig le der ni sa bon te //
T02TD1785E:10a-4: de las 'gro ba gsum rnams skye //
T02TD1785E:10a-5: ae ni shes rab nyid gyur la //
T02TD1785E:10a-6: wa ni rab dga'i bdag po'o //
T02TD1785E:10a-7: thig le mi shigs de nyid de //
T02TD1785E:10a-8: de las yi ge nyid kyang skye //
T02TD1785E:10a-9: chos kyi phyag rgya yi ge gnyis //
T02TD1785E:10a-10: de nyid shes pa gang gis shes //
T02TD1785E:10a-11: de ni sems can thams cad la //
T02TD1785E:10a-13: 'gro ba gang gis yi ge gnyis //
T02TD1785E:10a-14: mi shes rtag tu 'don pa dag / de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams las //
T02TD1785E:10a-15: phyi rol sbyor spangs thub ba bzhin //
T02TD1785E:10a-16: ae wam yig gnyis sgyu ma la //
T02TD1785E:10a-17: thams cad mkhyen pa 'dir bzhugs pas //
T02TD1785E:10a-18: dam chos bstan pa'i thog mar ni //
T02TD1785E:10a-19: ae wam de phyir rab tu bshad //
T02TD1785E:10a-20: de bas brgya byin lha yi bdag / gal te rtag pa'i gnas 'dod na //
T02TD1785E:10a-21: yid gnyis sgyu ma dran bya zhing //
T02TD1785E:10a-22: dam pa'i chos la bla mar gyis //
T02TD1785E:10a-23: bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i tshig rnams kyi don kyang bshad pa'i rgyud las bstan pa la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1785E:10a-24: 'khor lo sbrul ba'i ngo bo la //
T02TD1785E:10a-25: bdag gis thos pa zhes gsungs te //
T02TD1785E:10a-26: sa bon ngo bos gang sbrul pa //
T02TD1785E:10a-27: lha rnams kyi ni 'khor lo mchog / mchog tu dga' ba'i dus gang yin //
T02TD1785E:10a-28: dus gcig na zhes bshad pa yin //
T02TD1785E:10a-29: dbang phyug brgyad kyis bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1785E:10a-30: bde ba chen po'i gnas la bzhugs //
T02TD1785E:10a-31: 'di yi phung bo lnga rgyal ba //
T02TD1785E:10a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yin //
T02TD1785E:10a-33: de yi bdag nyid sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1785E:10a-34: rdo rje thugs 'dir bde chen po //
T02TD1785E:10a-35: bcun ma legs sbyangs phyag rgya ste ;
T02TD1785E:10a-36: / legs sbyangs padma bha ga yin //
T02TD1785E:10a-37: bzhugs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa der //
T02TD1785E:10a-38: thig le'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:10a-40: cha gnyis pa ni dgu pa nyid kyis bshad //
T02TD1785E:10a-41: sum cu bcu pa lnga pa'i sa bon nyid //
T02TD1785E:10a-42: cha gnyis lnga pa drug bas phye ba las //
T02TD1785E:10a-43: byung ba 'di ni thig le yin zhes bshad //
T02TD1785E:10a-44: ces bya ba ni spyi'i don to //
T02TD1785E:10a-47: ae ni shes rab dam pa ste //
T02TD1785E:10a-48: 'dod chags bral sogs skad cig bdag / srid pa gsum na yod shes pa'i //
T02TD1785E:10a-49: 'dir ni rtsa bar rnam par bstan //
T02TD1785E:10b-0: chags la @10b sogs pa rab skyed ldan //
T02TD1785E:10b-1: snang ba mched pa rnam par shes //
T02TD1785E:10b-2: ming ni thabs shes bya ba yin //
T02TD1785E:10b-4: rig chen rang nyid rtsa ba ste //
T02TD1785E:10b-5: lcags las bzlog pa'i ma rig pa'o //
T02TD1785E:10b-9: rnam shes dang po 'jug pa ni //
T02TD1785E:10b-10: snang ba mched pa'i ming du ste //
T02TD1785E:10b-11: de ni stong ba cher 'jug la //
T02TD1785E:10b-14: snang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1785E:10b-15: gang 'dir rnam shes gsum thos pa //
T02TD1785E:10b-16: sems can khams ni ma lus pa'i //
T02TD1785E:10b-17: rang bzhin rtsa ba 'di yin no //
T02TD1785E:10b-19: de ni re re'i don snang ba //
T02TD1785E:10b-20: rlung gis blangs nas 'dzin byed la //
T02TD1785E:10b-21: rlung dang ldan pa'i rnam shes ni //
T02TD1785E:10b-24: 'di ni rlung khams chen po ste //
T02TD1785E:10b-25: rnam shes gsum gyi bzhon pa yin //
T02TD1785E:10b-26: de yis rang bzhin rtag tu ni //
T02TD1785E:10b-28: ka / sra ba'i khams dang chu nyid dang ;
T02TD1785E:10b-29: / de bzhin me dang rlung dag ni //
T02TD1785E:10b-30: rnam par shes pas blangs nas su //
T02TD1785E:10b-31: srid gsum gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1785E:10b-33: 'di ni phung po lnga rnams su //
T02TD1785E:10b-36: rnam shes nyid ni lnga pa'o //
T02TD1785E:10b-38: mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang //
T02TD1785E:10b-39: bya ba sgrub pa nyid dad ni //
T02TD1785E:10b-40: me long dang ni chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1785E:10b-41: 'di ni rnam shes lnga po yin //
T02TD1785E:10b-43: yid kyi skye mched nyid dang ni //
T02TD1785E:10b-44: mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang //
T02TD1785E:10b-45: sna dang lce dang lus rnams te //
T02TD1785E:10b-48: gang yang khams gsum sems can rnams //
T02TD1785E:10b-49: srog dang rtsol ba la brten pa'i //
T02TD1785E:10b-50: gsang sngags rgyal ba zlos bzhin du //
T02TD1785E:10b-51: mi shes bsam gtan klog pa spangs //
T02TD1785E:10b-54: chags dang chags med la sogs pa //
T02TD1785E:10b-55: de las dge dang mi dge'i las //
T02TD1785E:10b-56: de las skye ba 'byung ba yin //
T02TD1785E:10b-57: ga /'gro bar 'byung ba'i phung po yang //
T02TD1785E:10b-58: sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid de //
T02TD1785E:10b-59: mngon bar byang chub rnam lnga zhes //
T02TD1785E:10b-60: ming gis rab tu bskul ba yin //
T02TD1785E:10b-62: rlung dang me dang chu dang //
T02TD1785E:10b-63: spyan la sogs pa bzhi po ste //
T02TD1785E:11a-2: shes bya sangs rgyas byang chub ster //
T02TD1785E:11a-4: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus //
T02TD1785E:11a-5: phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab cing //
T02TD1785E:11a-6: mig la sogs pa'i bdag nyid der //
T02TD1785E:11a-7: sa snying la sogs rgyal pa'i sras //
T02TD1785E:11a-9: rol pas dga' ba gang yin pa'i //
T02TD1785E:11a-10: khro bo'i rgyal po stobs chen rnams //
T02TD1785E:11a-11: de ni phyogs mtshams ngo bo ru //
T02TD1785E:11a-12: dpung pa yan lag rnams su brtag / ta /
T02TD1785E:11a-13: de dang de yi rigs byung ba'i //
T02TD1785E:11a-14: lha dang lha mo tha dad pa //
T02TD1785E:11a-15: de ni yod min de med kyang //
T02TD1785E:11a-16: 'gro ba'i don phyir rab tu ston //
T02TD1785E:11a-18: de bas gnyis med mthong ba yi //
T02TD1785E:11a-19: rnal 'byor pas ni ye shes gsum //
T02TD1785E:11a-20: mthong phyir dman dang bar ma dang //
T02TD1785E:11a-21: dam pa'i yul la gzhag par bya //
T02TD1785E:11a-22: ga / dbang po rang nyid rang yul la //
T02TD1785E:11a-23: 'gro bar gyur pa de dang de //
T02TD1785E:11a-24: dbang po gang dang gang spyod yul //
T02TD1785E:11a-25: de de snang ba tsam nyid do //
T02TD1785E:11a-27: dbang po de de'i lam nas ni //
T02TD1785E:11a-28: sgrub pa pos ni yul thob pa //
T02TD1785E:11a-29: de bzhin de rnams ma lus par //
T02TD1785E:11a-30: tshim bar bya phyir dbul bar bya //
T02TD1785E:11a-32: sku gsum dag ni tha dad par //
T02TD1785E:11a-33: skyob pa yis ni yang dag bstan //
T02TD1785E:11a-34: rdzogs pa'i rim gyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1785E:11a-35: gcig tu yang ni 'gyur ba yi //
T02TD1785E:11a-37: gang zhig sangs rgyas sku'i mtshan nyid //
T02TD1785E:11a-38: kun rdzob bden par gsungs pa ni //
T02TD1785E:11a-39: de nyid rdzogs pa'i sbyor 'gyur bas //
T02TD1785E:11a-40: 'od gsal bar ni rnam par dag / w'a ka / tshig gi lam gyi yul 'di nyid //
T02TD1785E:11a-41: gtso bo'i ye shes sku rang bzhin //
T02TD1785E:11a-42: sems can kun la phan ba'i phyir //
T02TD1785E:11a-43: 'ja' tshon bzhin du snang ba yin //
T02TD1785E:11a-45: sems dang sems byung ma rig pa //
T02TD1785E:11a-46: shes rab thabs dang nyer thob dang //
T02TD1785E:11a-47: stong dang shin tu stong pa dang //
T02TD1785E:11a-48: stong chen zhes kyang rab tu brjod //
T02TD1785E:11a-50: rang bzhin snang ba'i dbyer shes nas //
T02TD1785E:11a-51: de nas spyod pa rab tu bya //
T02TD1785E:11a-52: las kyi lus ni yongs spangs nas //
T02TD1785E:11a-55: thugs la 'jig rten pa rnams kyi //
T02TD1785E:11a-56: don spyod bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1785E:11a-57: kun rdzob tu ni skur sprul nas //
T02TD1785E:11a-58: ji lta ji ltar 'dod la spyod //
T02TD1785E:11a-60: yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin du //
T02TD1785E:11b-0: sangs rgyas @11b rnams kyi phun tshogs kyang //
T02TD1785E:11b-1: stobs kyis blangs nas spyod par 'gyur //
T02TD1785E:11b-4: de de thogs pa med par bya //
T02TD1785E:11b-5: mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1785E:11b-8: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor bas //
T02TD1785E:11b-9: ye shes gsum gyi cha rig pa //
T02TD1785E:11b-10: blo la gos dang ma gos pas //
T02TD1785E:11b-11: der ni bde bas rtag tu gnas //
T02TD1785E:11b-13: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1785E:11b-14: dngos bdag kun la rnam par rol //
T02TD1785E:11b-15: sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed bzhin du //
T02TD1785E:11b-16: gtan la phab pa'i gzhi la gnas //
T02TD1785E:11b-20: rdo rje can dang mkha' 'gro dang //
T02TD1785E:11b-21: gang yang rnal 'byor de rang nyid //
T02TD1785E:11b-23: bkag pa dag kyang byed pas na //
T02TD1785E:11b-24: bya dang bya min rnams spangs te //
T02TD1785E:11b-26: ngo bo nyid shes gos mi 'gyur //
T02TD1785E:11b-28: yon tan brgyad dang nyer ldan pas //
T02TD1785E:11b-29: sems can thams cad rig 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1785E:11b-30: 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par //
T02TD1785E:11b-31: bdag nyid ye shes lus kyis spyod //
T02TD1785E:11b-33: gtso bo gang du spyod pa yi //
T02TD1785E:11b-34: de yi khyim ni nam mkha' nyid //
T02TD1785E:11b-35: bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis //
T02TD1785E:11b-36: de nyid du ni rtag tu dgyes //
T02TD1785E:11b-38: 'di la snang ba dbye ba la //
T02TD1785E:11b-39: thun mtshams nyin mo mtshan mo yi //
T02TD1785E:11b-40: 'jig rten tha snyad byas pa yis //
T02TD1785E:11b-41: ye shes gsum ni mthong phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:11b-43: sna tshogs pa yi tha snyad dag /'jig rten pas ni yongs brtags pa //
T02TD1785E:11b-44: lam gsum gyis ni dbye ba yis //
T02TD1785E:11b-45: ye shes rnam pa gsum 'byung ngo ;
T02TD1785E:11b-47: skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa dang //
T02TD1785E:11b-48: srid pa bar mar gnas pa ste //
T02TD1785E:11b-49: ji snyed 'jig rten gyis brtags pa //
T02TD1785E:11b-50: sems kyi rlung gi rnam 'phrul lo //
T02TD1785E:11b-52: dgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang //
T02TD1785E:11b-53: gar gyi ro dgur ldan ba dang //
T02TD1785E:11b-54: sngags dang phyag rgya rnam rtog pa //
T02TD1785E:11b-55: rdo rje sems dpa'i skyod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:11b-57: bdag byin brlab chen ma gtogs par //
T02TD1785E:11b-58: rin chen gzhan dag 'di na med //
T02TD1785E:11b-59: me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin //
T02TD1785E:11b-60: rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag pa'o //
T02TD1785E:11b-61: dpal ldan 'dus pa yongs gsal ba'i //
T02TD1785E:11b-62: bzhugs pa'i tshig don 'di dag ni //
T02TD1785E:12a-2: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin //
T02TD1785E:12a-4: yang lung gi bshad pa gsungs pa ni /
T02TD1785E:12a-5: de nyid 'di skad bdag gis thos //
T02TD1785E:12a-6: gsal ba 'ga' zhig dus yin te //
T02TD1785E:12a-7: rdo rje gsang dbang bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD1785E:12a-8: rdo rje dam tshig gsum gyi mchog / ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
T02TD1785E:12a-9: ye shes phun tshogs bsam mi khyab //
T02TD1785E:12a-10: yod med gnyis ka las 'das pa'i //
T02TD1785E:12a-11: gnas med gnas pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-12: nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'di la ni //
T02TD1785E:12a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgom //
T02TD1785E:12a-14: 'gro snying rnam dag ces bya la /
T02TD1785E:12a-15: thub pa chen po bzhugs par mdzad //
T02TD1785E:12a-16: mthar thug pa ste slob ma la bshad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-17: de ltar bzhugs pa'i tshig nyid kyi rgyud ma lus pa'i dgongs pa bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:12a-18: de'i 'og tu brjod kyis mi lang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ston te /
T02TD1785E:12a-19: brjod kyis mi lang ba ni bgrang ba las 'das pa'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-20: yang brjod kyis mi lang ba ni /
T02TD1785E:12a-21: gzugs dang yon tan la sogs pa rnams tshig gi spyod yul las 'das pa ste /
T02TD1785E:12a-22: de dag gis ni tshad med pa nyid du bstan to //
T02TD1785E:12a-23: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:12a-24: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dang 'brel pa'i rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
T02TD1785E:12a-25: de las gang gis lha'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de tsam nyid cig bstan pa'i phyir 'di lta ste /
T02TD1785E:12a-26: dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1785E:12a-27: dam tshig rdo rje ni don yod par grub pa'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-28: 'dir yang de'i rigs dang ldan pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la dam tshig rdo rje'i sgrar brjod do //
T02TD1785E:12a-29: de bzhin du sku rdo rje ni sa'i snying po'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-30: gsung rdo rje ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02TD1785E:12a-31: thugs rdo rje ni phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-32: ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ni nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-33: rgyal pa rdo rje ni byams pa'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-34: sa rdo rje ni sangs rgyas spyan no //
T02TD1785E:12a-35: chu rdo rje ni m'a ma k'i'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-36: me rdo rje ni gos dkar mo'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-37: rlung rdo rje ni dam tshig sgrol ma'o //
T02TD1785E:12a-38: nam mkha' rdo rje ni 'jam dpal lo //
T02TD1785E:12a-39: gzugs rdo rje ni yul gzugs so //
T02TD1785E:12a-40: sgra rdo rje ni yul sgra'o //
T02TD1785E:12b-0: dri rdo rje ni @12b yul dri'o //
T02TD1785E:12b-1: ro rdo rje ni yul ro'o //
T02TD1785E:12b-2: reg rdo rje ni yul reg go //
T02TD1785E:12b-3: chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ni kun tu bzang po'o //
T02TD1785E:12b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'ba' zhig dang lhan cig tu bzhugs par ma zad kyi /
T02TD1785E:12b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang yang lhan cig bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:12b-6: de dag la sogs pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:12b-7: de dag ni gtso bo rnams so //
T02TD1785E:12b-8: sogs pa ni rigs lngas bsdus pa rnams so //
T02TD1785E:12b-9: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:12b-10: nam mkha' khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:12b-11: nam mkha'i khams su gtogs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa'i dpe bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:12b-13: zhes bya bas la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD1785E:12b-14: dper na til gyi gong bu ni til gyi sa bon phan tshun gtams te /
T02TD1785E:12b-15: gcig la gcig bcer ba'i tshul gyis gnas la /
T02TD1785E:12b-16: de bzhin du ston par mdzad pa'i dus na /
T02TD1785E:12b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bzhugs so zhes dgongs te drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:12b-18: brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo snyed dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD1785E:12b-19: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi yan lag gi cha shas su gyur pa yin te /
T02TD1785E:12b-21: mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni //
T02TD1785E:12b-22: sangs rgyas lnga ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1785E:12b-23: rdo rje'i skye mched nyid dag kyang //
T02TD1785E:12b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog / ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:12b-25: de bas na bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi rang gi sku'i dkyil 'khor rnam par spros nas /
T02TD1785E:12b-26: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lta bus 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:12b-27: gzhal yas khang gi dbus su bzhugs pa ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:12b-30: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:13a-0: de ni 'dod ba'i khams na gnas pa'i yul la chags pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i sgo nas grol ba rab tu bstan @13a * //
T02TD1785E:13a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:13a-3: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02TD1785E:13a-4: yon tan brgyad kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02TD1785E:13a-5: chen po yang yin la rnam par snang mdzad kyang yin pas na rnam par snang mdzad chen po ste /
T02TD1785E:13a-6: 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags rab tu spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:13a-7: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sku spangs nas /
T02TD1785E:13a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i skur bdag nyid mngon par sprul par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:13a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po ni /
T02TD1785E:13a-10: sems can rnams smin cing grol bar mdzad pas yul rnams la chags par mdzad pa ste /
T02TD1785E:13a-11: de nyid kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1785E:13a-12: bshad ma thag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad ces bya ba dkyil 'khor pa rnams nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad do zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:13a-13: rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus drangs nas nyid kyi sku la phung po dang /
T02TD1785E:13a-14: khams la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis zhugs par gyur to //
T02TD1785E:13a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chad chen po'i sku la zhugs ba dang bcom ldan 'das yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:13a-17: bcom ldan 'das mchog tu dga' ba'i bde bas tshim par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:13a-18: nyid kyi sku bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul nas zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:13a-19: gnas skabs snga ma spangs te lha'i bu mo'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las byung bar gyur to //
T02TD1785E:13a-20: de la la la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de nyid bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:13a-21: sa'i khams ne sangs rgyas spyan lta bu'o //
T02TD1785E:13a-22: chu'i khams ni m'a ma k'i lta bu'o //
T02TD1785E:13a-23: me'i khams ni gos dkar mo lta bu'o //
T02TD1785E:13a-24: rlung gi khams ni sol ma lta bur gnas pa'o /
T02TD1785E:13a-25: yang rnam par snang mdzad ni gzugs kyi ngo bo lta bu'o //
T02TD1785E:13a-26: rin chen 'byung ldan ni sgra'i ngo bo lta bu'o //
T02TD1785E:13a-27: snang ba mtha' yas ni dri'i ngo bo lta bu'o //
T02TD1785E:13a-28: don yod par grub pa ni ro'i ngo bo lta bu'o //
T02TD1785E:13a-29: mi bskyod pa ni reg bya'i ngo bo lta bu'o //
T02TD1785E:13b-0: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste drang ba'i don @13b to //
T02TD1785E:13b-1: 'dod chags kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas 'dod chags chen po ste 'dod chags chen po'i chos so //
T02TD1785E:13b-2: de'i tshul ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1785E:13b-3: 'dod chags par ma la sogs pa'i rim gyis rnam par dag pa mngon du 'byin pa'i thabs te /
T02TD1785E:13b-4: de nyid kyi ming dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1785E:13b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:13b-6: zhes bya ba'i don ni phyi rol gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag tu dmigs pa'i mngon par zhen pa spangs nas /
T02TD1785E:13b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las yongs su bsgrub pa'i sku na bdag yin no //
T02TD1785E:13b-8: zhes byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1785E:13b-9: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad ste //
T02TD1785E:13b-10: rgyal sras thams cad nyid kyang yin //
T02TD1785E:13b-11: zhes lung las gsungs pas so //
T02TD1785E:13b-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:13b-13: de ltar gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug du bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:13b-14: da ni rgyud 'di la sems gtso bo yin pas /
T02TD1785E:13b-15: mi bskyod pas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:13b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas bzhag par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:13b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i bha ga la zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02TD1785E:13b-18: shes rab kyi gnas der chud par gru bzhi la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:13b-19: dri ma thams cad dang bral bas rdul med pa'o //
T02TD1785E:13b-20: dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po yin te /
T02TD1785E:13b-21: de'i dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1785E:13b-22: byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba ni sprul par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:13b-23: gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1785E:13b-24: ces bya ba ni gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang shel gyi nang du chud pa'i gzugs sa snang ba ltar /
T02TD1785E:13b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi sku mthong bas so //
T02TD1785E:13b-26: sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du rgyas //
T02TD1785E:14a-0: zhes bya ba ni aindra n'i la la sogs pa kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i gsungs @14a * //
T02TD1785E:14a-2: sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab //
T02TD1785E:14a-4: phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyis khyab pa'o //
T02TD1785E:14a-5: 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug / ces bya ba ni phyogs bcur khro bo'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rab tu 'bar ba 'khrug ba'o //
T02TD1785E:14a-6: gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02TD1785E:14a-7: zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la sogs pa ni gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1785E:14a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1785E:14a-10: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas te /
T02TD1785E:14a-11: rten gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:14a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1785E:14a-13: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po de bshad ma thag pa'i dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su bdag nyid bzhag par gyur ba'o //
T02TD1785E:14a-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:14a-15: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la zhugs pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:14a-16: rigs lngas bsdus pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor slar yang byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i sku la zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:14a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ni rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1785E:14a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa yin la /
T02TD1785E:14a-20: de rnams kyi gang brtan cing bzhugs pa'i gnas su mdzad pa'i btsun mo ste /
T02TD1785E:14a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:14a-23: de nyid ni bha ga ste /
T02TD1785E:14a-24: sangs rgyas skyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na skye gnas yin te /
T02TD1785E:14a-25: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1785E:14a-26: sangs rgyas kun gyi gang bsten pa'i //
T02TD1785E:14a-27: sar gyur de ni bcu gsum pa //
T02TD1785E:14a-28: de ni btsun mor yang dag bshad //
T02TD1785E:14a-29: dam chos bha ga zhes brjod do //
T02TD1785E:14a-31: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa der bdag nyid zhugs par gyur pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:14a-33: gsal ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:14a-34: shel dang 'dra bas na gsal ba'o //
T02TD1785E:14a-35: dang ba'i rang bzhin yin pas na /
T02TD1785E:14a-37: 'od zer lngas kun tu khyab pas na sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun tu rgyas so //
T02TD1785E:14b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @14b thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab po //
T02TD1785E:14b-1: khro bo'i 'od zer 'khrigs pas na 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug go //
T02TD1785E:14b-2: snang ba chen po la sogs pa snang ba gsum du sprul pas na gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan no //
T02TD1785E:14b-3: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ni /
T02TD1785E:14b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas te /
T02TD1785E:14b-5: de lta bu'i dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal bar rab tu zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD1785E:14b-6: de nas 'od gsal bar zhugs pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang /
T02TD1785E:14b-7: thugs kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:14b-8: bdag nyid don dam pa'i bden pa las bzhengs nas srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ro gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par gyur to //
T02TD1785E:14b-9: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po nyid du bzhag par gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:14b-10: nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
T02TD1785E:14b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1785E:14b-12: zhes pa bde mchog gis bshad pas so //
T02TD1785E:14b-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD1785E:14b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir phung po la sogs par rjes su zhugs pas sprul pa'i sku 'dzin par mdzad pa bstan pa yin te nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:14b-15: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:14b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te 'das pa dang /
T02TD1785E:14b-18: da ltar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim gyis gcig tu mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:14b-19: don de nyid ni rdo rje ste de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:14b-20: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to //
T02TD1785E:14b-21: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams su gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:15a-1: par gyur pa des ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02TD1785E:15a-2: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:15a-3: sems can thams cad dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i 'jug pas zhugs nas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob ba'o //
T02TD1785E:15a-4: de bas na bde pa dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to zhes bya ba gsungs te spyi'i don no //
T02TD1785E:15a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la ting nge 'dzin gang gi phung po la sogs pa'i ngo bo rnams kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pas zil gyis mnan cing gcig tu mdzad la /
T02TD1785E:15a-6: de nyid rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa yin pas de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15a-7: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nam mkha'i dbyangs 'di thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:15a-8: 'dir rtsa phran stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi khong stong ngo //
T02TD1785E:15a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ni 'dir thabs kyi ye shes so //
T02TD1785E:15a-10: de'i ngo bo nyid ni de'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1785E:15a-11: gnas par gyur to zhes pa ni byung bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:15a-12: sems can thams cad ces bya ba ni phung pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi ye shes shar pas so //
T02TD1785E:15a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:15a-15: dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba las 'dod chags chen po'i mes zhu bar gyur nas mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba myang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:15a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni phung po lnga rnams so //
T02TD1785E:15a-18: de rnams zil gyis mnan pa ni don dam pa'i bden pas gcig tu mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15a-19: de nyid mi phyed pas rdo rje ste /
T02TD1785E:15a-20: de skad ces ya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15a-21: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu nam mkha'i dbyings 'di zhes pa ni stong pa nyid gsum mo //
T02TD1785E:15a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ni /
T02TD1785E:15a-23: thams cad stong pa nyid de de'i ngo bor gnas par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15a-24: de nas nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya pa la sogs pas kyang don 'di nyid gsal bar ston te mthar thug par bshad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15b-0: de ltar lhag par mos pas @15b rdo rje 'chang chen po bskyed nas /
T02TD1785E:15b-1: da ni yongs su dag pa dang /
T02TD1785E:15b-2: yongs su ma dag pa'i lha rnams kyi sku bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:15b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni yi ge gsum ste de nyid ni 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //
T02TD1785E:15b-4: de las byung bas na skyes pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15b-5: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
T02TD1785E:15b-6: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15b-7: rigs pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs //
T02TD1785E:15b-8: zhes bya ba ni rig pa chen pos ni gsang sngags kyi yi ge rnams so //
T02TD1785E:15b-9: de rnams kyis skyes bu'i gzugs bkyed pa gang yin pa de ni rigs pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs so //
T02TD1785E:15b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi bdag po 'di byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:15b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags ni yi ge aom la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:15b-12: de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni bkod pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD1785E:15b-14: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshul du rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim gyis sems dpa' gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi ji srid sngags thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid du byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15b-15: byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa des ji lta bu'i rnam par gyur zhe na /
T02TD1785E:15b-16: zhal gsum pa lta bur zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:15b-17: gdul bya rnams la de ltar snang bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15b-18: de bas na 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa rnams kyis yang dag bar mthong bar gyur to zhes gsungs te drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:15b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1785E:15b-20: de las byung ba ni skyes pa ste /
T02TD1785E:15b-21: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD1785E:15b-22: chen po mchog dang tshad med dang //
T02TD1785E:15b-23: mkhas brtson spro ba'i las bdag nyid //
T02TD1785E:15b-25: chen po zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02TD1785E:15b-26: zhes gsungs pas rig pa chen po ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T02TD1785E:15b-27: skyes bu ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16a-0: de dag las bskyed pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la sogs pa @16a * //
T02TD1785E:16a-1: dang bcas pa'i skyes bu lta bu'i lha'i sku ni rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs te rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1785E:16a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so //
T02TD1785E:16a-3: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra rab las bsgrubs pas bdag nyid bskyed pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02TD1785E:16a-4: byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin te nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:16a-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:16a-6: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dga' ba'i thugs kyis sngar bshad pa'i thugs ka nas byung ste ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:16a-8: zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa ste /
T02TD1785E:16a-9: hi zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:16a-10: byang chub sems ni rab byung ba //
T02TD1785E:16a-11: zhes bya ba ni lha'i sku rnam pa gnyis gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud las rab tu byung ba ni /
T02TD1785E:16a-12: byang chub sems ni rab tu byung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:16a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:16a-14: 'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:16a-15: sba bar bya ba yin pas na gsang ba'o //
T02TD1785E:16a-16: brtag pa dang bral bas na rab tu mi rtog go //
T02TD1785E:16a-17: khams gsum la mi gnas pas na gnas pa med pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD1785E:16a-18: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16a-19: da ni ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya rnams la slob dpon dang slob ma'i 'brel pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:16a-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:16a-21: de nas zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16a-22: gcig tu 'dus nas zhes bya ba ni 'dus pa mdzad nas /
T02TD1785E:16a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa de kho na nyid dam tshig rin po che'i rgya mtsho'i tshogs ni sprin te de rnams kyis mchod de 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:16a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:16a-25: de rnams dang ldan pa'i mchod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16a-26: de'i rgyas pa ni mang du byas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16a-27: de kho na nyid kyi rin po che ni bud med rin po che'o //
T02TD1785E:16a-28: dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa ste de rnams kyi sprin ni tshogs te /
T02TD1785E:16b-0: des mchod de phyag 'tshal @16b nas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:16b-1: 'dus pa gsang ba bshad du gsol //
T02TD1785E:16b-4: gnyis gcig tu gyur pa ni 'dus pa ste yi ge'i don to //
T02TD1785E:16b-6: padma yang dag par sbyor ba ni 'dus pa ste spyi'i don to //
T02TD1785E:16b-7: shes rab dang thabs yang dag par sbyor ba ni 'dus pa ste sbas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-8: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag 'dres pa ni 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-9: gsang ba las byung ba ni /
T02TD1785E:16b-10: de nyid kyi khyad par ste gsang ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-11: de las byung ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po zhes bya ba'i bar du ste mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
T02TD1785E:16b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i gsang zhing sba bar bya'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-15: rdo rje snying po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02TD1785E:16b-16: de rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can ni 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-17: de kho na nyid ni ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-18: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
T02TD1785E:16b-19: byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-20: legs so legs so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:16b-21: zhal gyis bzhes par mdzad pa ste dris pa'i don mngon par 'dod pa ston pas so //
T02TD1785E:16b-22: 'on kyang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rnam par brtag pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tshom skye bar byed pa yin na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:16b-24: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' ni slob bzhin pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin par blta bar bya'i /
T02TD1785E:16b-25: nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni som nyi yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD1785E:16b-26: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:16b-27: rin po che lta bu'i gang zag dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa thos pa'i pha rol tu son pa sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod cing rigs nges pa'o //
T02TD1785E:16b-28: 'dus pa'i don ni bla ma'i lung dang bral na de rnams kyi yang yul ma yin ta brtag pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:17a-0: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos @17a * //
T02TD1785E:17a-2: tsandan lta bu'i gang zag la sogs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa /
T02TD1785E:17a-3: mos pa dman pa rnams kyis rtogs pa lta ci smos /
T02TD1785E:17a-4: gzung bar dka' zhing spro ba med pa nyid du brda sprod pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:17a-5: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas rin po che lta bu'i gang zag rigs nges pa rnams kyi yang 'di yul ma yin no zhes bas ni ngo mtshar du gyur la /
T02TD1785E:17a-6: padma dkar po lta bu la sogs pa rigs ma nges pa rnams kyis lta ci smos pa zhes pas ni rmad du gyur nas /
T02TD1785E:17a-7: slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1785E:17a-8: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can du gyur pa yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:17a-9: gang gi phyir 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par du gyur pa la yang zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i gang zag nyid yin par ston pa yin te dgongs pas bshad pa'o//
T02TD1785E:17a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:17a-11: dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa rigs gsum du yongs su gyur pa ste yi ge'i don to //
T02TD1785E:17a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni yi ge gsum ste spyi'i don no //
T02TD1785E:17a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni ye shes gsum po rang bzhin gyi snang ba rlung gi bzhon pa dang ldan pa ste sbas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:17a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ste mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD1785E:17a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis byin gyis brlab par mdzad nas bstan du gsol zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02TD1785E:17a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa ni sku la sogs par zhugs pa ste mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:17a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis zhes bya ba ste yi ge'i don to //
T02TD1785E:17a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ni /
T02TD1785E:17b-0: sku rdo rje la sogs pa ste de rnams 'byung ba'i tshig ni de bskyed pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge ste @17b spyi'i don to //
T02TD1785E:17b-1: rdo rje dam tshig ni dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:17b-2: de las byung ba'i tshig ni byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le'o //
T02TD1785E:17b-3: des byin gyis brlabs pa ni dbang bskur ba byas pa ste sbas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:17b-4: rdo rje dam tshig ni 'od gsal pa'o //
T02TD1785E:17b-5: de las byung ba'i tshig ni chen po stong pa dang /
T02TD1785E:17b-8: des byin gyis brlab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bya'i skye ba'i rgyud la lha'i sku rnam pa gnyis gsal bar mdzad pa yin la de yang dag par ston par mdzod cig pa ste mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD1785E:17b-9: de ltar gsol ba btab pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas de rnams la dbang bskur ba'i phyir ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sprul par mdzad do /
T02TD1785E:17b-10: ye shes nyid sgron ma yin pas na ye shes sgron ma ste yi ge'i don no //
T02TD1785E:17b-11: ye shes sgron ma ste sems can rnams kyi rgyud la ye shes kyis snang ba mdzad pas na mi bskyod pa la bya ste spyi'i don no //
T02TD1785E:17b-12: ye shes ni rnam par shes pa gsum gyi snang bas phyogs bcur snang bar mdzad pas sgron ma dang 'dra bas na sgron ma zhes bya la ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste sbas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:17b-14: na ni dgag pa la 'jug ste gang la rtogs pa med pa de ni ye shes so //
T02TD1785E:17b-16: don dam pa'i bden pa brjod du med pa nyid yin pas so //
T02TD1785E:17b-17: de nyid ni snang ba ma lus pa zil gyis mnan nas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par snang bar byed pas na sgron ma'o //
T02TD1785E:17b-19: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ste mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD1785E:17b-20: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas nyon mongs pa lngas khyab pa'i sems can gyi khams la gzigs nas /
T02TD1785E:17b-21: nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin yongs su shes pa nyid ni byang chub yin la /
T02TD1785E:17b-22: de'i ngo bo nyid ni bdag yin no zhes mkhyen nas /
T02TD1785E:18a-0: gdul bya rnams kyi nyon mongs pa zhe sdang rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir zhe snang gi rigs kyi mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ba'o zhes bya ba ste thugs @18a * //
T02TD1785E:18a-1: rje chen po'i thabs kyi khro bo ni zhe sdang yin la /
T02TD1785E:18a-2: de'i rigs ni zhe sdang gi rigs so //
T02TD1785E:18a-3: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu skyes bas ni mchog gi snying po'i snying po ste sngags so zhes bya ba ni blo la bzhag pa'o //
T02TD1785E:18a-4: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo zhes pa ni snyoms par 'jug pas yang dag par 'byin par mdzad pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:18a-5: badzra dhri ka ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:18a-6: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par ston pa'i rdo rje 'dzin par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'chang ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:18a-7: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje'i ye shes 'dzin pa mdzad pas na rdo rje 'chang ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:18a-8: de nas 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas zhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02TD1785E:18a-9: de nyid ces bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1785E:18a-10: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni de gsum gyi bdag nyid can no //
T02TD1785E:18a-11: rig pa'i skyes bu zhes bya ba ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02TD1785E:18a-12: mi bskyod ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni zhal nag po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:18a-13: de rnams dang sbyor ba ni gcig tu gyur pa ste de nyid thabs so //
T02TD1785E:18a-14: nag po dkar po dmar po'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02TD1785E:18a-15: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:18a-16: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la zhugs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:18a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' phyung ba zhes bya ba dang po ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:18a-18: dang po'i sbyor ba'i 'og tu 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor ston pas /
T02TD1785E:18a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02TD1785E:18a-20: dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi don ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1785E:18a-21: sems can rmongs pa rnams rnam par spyad ba'i phyir zhi ba'i tshul gang yin pa ni gti mug ste de nyid ni mchog gis gnas so //
T02TD1785E:18a-22: de'i rigs ni gti mug gi mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1785E:18a-23: mchog gi snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1785E:18a-24: dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:18a-25: rgyal ba'i ngang tshul can yin pas na rgyal ba ste rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bdud rnams las rgyal bas na rgyal ba ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:18b-0: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis @18b bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pas na rgyal ba rgyal te nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:18b-1: bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni spyan sngar bzhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar te rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po dang bcas pa gcig tu gyur nas /
T02TD1785E:18b-2: spyan sngar zhes bya ba mdun du bcom ldan 'das la gzigs shing bzhugs pa de sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:18b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02TD1785E:18b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che ni kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems te /
T02TD1785E:18b-5: de las byung bas rin po che 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:18b-6: rdo rje dpal ni phyag rgya chen po phun sum tshogs pa la bya ba yin la /
T02TD1785E:18b-7: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de mngon du mdzad pa ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:18b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che ni don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
T02TD1785E:18b-9: de las byung bas ni rin po che 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:18b-10: rdo rje dpal ni mi 'jigs pa'i dpal te /
T02TD1785E:18b-11: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:18b-12: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste de'i rigs so //
T02TD1785E:18b-13: mchog gi snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don no bshad zin to //
T02TD1785E:18b-14: ratna dhri ka ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:18b-15: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rin po che 'dzin par mdzad pas na rin chen 'chang ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:18b-16: yang dag pa'i mtha'i rin po che 'dzin par mdzad pas na rin chen 'chang ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:18b-17: rin chen dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po dang lhan cig tu gyur pa ni yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1785E:18b-18: de nyid nam mkha'i gnas zhes bya ste /
T02TD1785E:18b-19: nor gyis dregs shing khengs pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pas 'dul bar mdzad cing nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas la yang dag par bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas phyogs su bzhugs pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:18b-20: de bzhin du 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags rab tu spang ba'i don du /
T02TD1785E:19a-0: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i rnal 'byor bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba @19a * //
T02TD1785E:19a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02TD1785E:19a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02TD1785E:19a-4: de'i rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems yin la /
T02TD1785E:19a-5: de las 'byung ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1785E:19a-7: de las 'byung ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1785E:19a-8: de nyid rdo rje yin la /
T02TD1785E:19a-9: de la dmigs pa ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19a-10: 'dod chags kyi rigs zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la kun du chags pa ni rdo rje 'dod chags te de'i rigs so //
T02TD1785E:19a-11: mchog gi snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1785E:19a-12: a'a ro li ka zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:19a-15: lika ni de las 'das pas na a'a ro lika ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19a-16: ro zhes bya ba ni ye shes gsum mo //
T02TD1785E:19a-17: de bas na don dam pa'i bden pa bgrod par gyur pa ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19a-18: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
T02TD1785E:19a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba ni don yod par grub pa'o de nyid dam tshig ste /
T02TD1785E:19a-20: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don rdzogs par byed pas na 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas so //
T02TD1785E:19a-22: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par 'jug pa ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19a-23: gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ni 'od gsal ba ste /
T02TD1785E:19a-24: mtshan ma med pa'i 'bras bu ster bas so //
T02TD1785E:19a-26: de la dmigs pa ni nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19a-27: nyon mongs pa phrag dog rnam par spyong ba nyid dang /
T02TD1785E:19a-28: nyon mongs pas dam tshig nyams pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa sel bar byed pa'i don gyi rigs ni dam tshig dgug pa'i rigs te drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19a-29: dam tshig ni khams phra ba ste /
T02TD1785E:19a-30: des thabs kyi ye shes bkug nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyod pas yongs su spyong ba'i rigs ni dam tshig dgug pa'i rigs te nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19a-31: mchog gi snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1785E:19b-0: pradzny'a @19b dhrika ces bya ba ni rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab ste /
T02TD1785E:19b-1: de 'dzin pas mdzad pas na shes rab 'chang ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19b-2: shes rab ni zla bar snang ba ste de khams phra bas 'dzin par mdzad pas na shes rab 'chang ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19b-3: byang phyogs su bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:19b-4: zhe sdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:19b-5: gdul bya rnams kyi thar pa mngon par 'dod pa bskyed pas na 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:19b-6: zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po ni thar pa ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19b-7: rigs sngar gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis //
T02TD1785E:19b-9: zhes bya ba ni rigs 'di rnams ni phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD1785E:19b-10: 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pas thar pa rab tu thob ba'am /
T02TD1785E:19b-11: yang na 'dod pa rab tu sgrub pa dang /
T02TD1785E:19b-12: thar pa rab tu sgrub pa'o zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:19b-14: de bas na bshad pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1785E:19b-15: phung po 'di dag sangs rgyas te //
T02TD1785E:19b-16: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rkyen du 'byung //
T02TD1785E:19b-17: gnyis med de bzhin nyid sbyor bas //
T02TD1785E:19b-18: de yang de bzhin gshegs zhes bya //
T02TD1785E:19b-19: zhes gsungs te nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19b-20: yang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i longs spyod kyi phyir lha mo bzhi phyung ba yin te /
T02TD1785E:19b-21: des na de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD1785E:19b-22: rdo rje 'dzin rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ni m'a ma k'i'o //
T02TD1785E:19b-23: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:19b-24: dva sha ra ti zhes bya ba la zhe sdang ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:19b-25: de la dga' bas na zhe sdang dga' ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19b-26: nyon mongs pa zhe sdang rnam par dag pa la dga' ba ni zhe sdang dga' ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:19b-27: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba de nyid m'a ma k'i'i gzugs su gyur nas shar phyogs kyi grvar bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:19b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1785E:19b-29: de rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje ni sangs rgyas spyan te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:19b-30: mo ha ra ti zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:19b-31: gti mug ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1785E:19b-32: de la dga' bas na gti mug dga' ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:20a-1: par dag pa la dga' bas na gti mug dga' ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:20a-2: lho phyogs kyi grvar bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:20a-4: 'dod chags 'dzin pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-5: de la rjes su chags par byed pa'i rdo rje ni gos dkar mo ste /
T02TD1785E:20a-6: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la de skad ces bya ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-7: r'a ga ra ti zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:20a-8: 'dod chags ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-9: de la dga' bas na 'dod chags dga' ste drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:20a-10: 'dod chags rnam par dag pa la dga' ba ni 'dod chags dga' ste nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:20a-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02TD1785E:20a-12: nub phyogs kyi grva bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sku dang gsung dang thugs mi rtag pa'o zhes gzhan dag la ston pa ni /
T02TD1785E:20a-14: sku dang gsung dang thugs slu ba ste yi ge'i don to //
T02TD1785E:20a-15: chos thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes dmigs pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs slu pa ste spyi'i don to //
T02TD1785E:20a-16: snang ba gsum gyi ngo bo nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs te /
T02TD1785E:20a-17: snang ba de dang de khams phra ba las zhugs nas skad cig re re zhing rjes su myong bar byas te slar yang dngos po med par byas pa ni /
T02TD1785E:20a-18: sku dang gsung dang thugs slu ba ste sbas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-19: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa la ril por 'dzin pa dang /
T02TD1785E:20a-20: rjes su gzhig pa'i rim gyis snang ba med par byas pa ni sku dang gsung dang thugs slu ba'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-21: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
T02TD1785E:20a-22: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
T02TD1785E:20a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ste mthar thug pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'dzin pa ni don yod par grub pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-25: de rjes su chags pa rdo rje'i dam tshig ni sgrol ma ste /
T02TD1785E:20a-26: de'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-27: badzra ra ti zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni don yod par grub pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20a-28: de la dga' pas na rdo rje dga' ste drang pa'i don dang /
T02TD1785E:20a-29: rdo rje ye shes la dga' bas na dga' ste /
T02TD1785E:20b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la byang phyogs kyi grar bzhugs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20b-2: lha mo bzhi po 'di dag ni lhan cig spyod pa ste /
T02TD1785E:20b-3: de rnams dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyor bar mdzad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog bskyed pas na btsun mo'i mchog go //
T02TD1785E:20b-4: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug yin pas btsun mo'i mchog dam tshig phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i sgras gsungs te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20b-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:20b-6: khro bo phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02TD1785E:20b-7: rnam par snang mdzad nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje gang yin pa de ni rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje ste /
T02TD1785E:20b-8: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnam par snang mdzad zhes bya ste /
T02TD1785E:20b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yin gyis rlob cing skyed pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20b-10: ya m'anta krita ces bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:20b-11: gshin rje ni dmyal ba ste /
T02TD1785E:20b-12: de bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mthar thug par mdzad cing 'jig par mdzad pas na gshin rje mthar byed de drang ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:20b-13: gshin rje ni rmongs pa'i mun pa ste ma rig pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20b-14: de don dam pa'i bden pas mthar thug par mdzad cing 'jig par mdzad pas na gshin rje mthar byed de nges pa'i don to //
T02TD1785E:20b-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:20b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:20b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD1785E:20b-18: de'i cod pan gyi rdo rje gang yin pa ste /
T02TD1785E:20b-19: khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ste drang ba'i don to //
