T02TD1785E:184a-10: rdo rje'i sku ste skyes pa dang bud med kyi dbang po gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i nyams su myong pa gsum ste /
T02TD1785E:184a-11: chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang chags pa bar ma ste /
T02TD1785E:184a-12: de la ni rdo rje sku gsum gyis mtshan pa zhes bya ste /
T02TD1785E:184a-13: khyu mchog ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD1785E:184a-14: phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:184a-15: gang zhig 'di dag ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:184a-16: gang zhig 'di dag bsgom pa yi ;
T02TD1785E:184a-17: / zhes bya ba ni bden pa mthong ba'o //
T02TD1785E:184a-18: byang chub ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1785E:184a-19: de sems pa re sems gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02TD1785E:184a-20: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rjes su mthun par gnas nas /
T02TD1785E:184a-21: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pas grags chen rnams so //
T02TD1785E:184a-22: 'od chen po ni brtson 'grus brtun pa can no //
T02TD1785E:184a-23: zhag bdun gyis zhes pa ni /
T02TD1785E:184a-24: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pas yun ring po mi thogs par 'thob pa'o //
T02TD1785E:184a-25: sku gsum ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste de'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1785E:184a-26: sems brtan pa thob pas phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs nas mchog tu bde ba nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:184a-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:184a-28: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i 'dod chags kyi mes zhu bar gyur pa rnams /
T02TD1785E:184a-29: gang du thig le'i gzugs kyis gcig tu gyur pa de ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1785E:184a-33: de'i sgrub pa'i yan lag la gnyid kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga ni gsang ba ste /
T02TD1785E:184a-34: de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1785E:184a-35: sku dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:184a-36: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni //
T02TD1785E:184b-0: @184b mnyam zhing rjes su 'gro bas na sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o //
T02TD1785E:184b-1: don ni sgrub pa po'i don te kun tu dga' ba'o //
T02TD1785E:184b-2: de 'khyud pa la sogs pas brtags shing rdzogs par byed pas na /
T02TD1785E:184b-3: phyag rgya chen po'i don brtags pa ste /
T02TD1785E:184b-4: lus dang ngag dang sems dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po'i don brtags pa des lhan cig chos spyod pa dang /
T02TD1785E:184b-5: 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /
T02TD1785E:184b-6: chags pa bar ma thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su shes pa'i rgyur /
T02TD1785E:184b-7: cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya 'dus byas pa'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD1785E:184b-8: gang gis bsgoms shing nye par spyad na de sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1785E:184b-9: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD1785E:184b-10: mnyam par 'jog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i rnam pa ston pa yin te /
T02TD1785E:184b-11: sgrub pa po thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:184b-12: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
T02TD1785E:184b-13: de rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi yul ma yin pas gsang ba ste tshig de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1785E:184b-14: gal te byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:184b-15: byang chub kyi mchog rdo rje 'chang chen po de'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du gyur par 'dod cing /
T02TD1785E:184b-16: bsgoms na lag pa'i phyag rgya phyi rol gyi lha la mngon par zhen par byed pa mi bcing ste /
T02TD1785E:184b-17: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02TD1785E:184b-18: mngon sum yin na gzhan ci tshol //
T02TD1785E:184b-20: sngags rnams kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:184b-21: don thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i sngags rnams ni sngags rnams thams cad de /
T02TD1785E:184b-22: de lta bu'i gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi /
T02TD1785E:184b-23: dam tshig 'di ni rgyal ba rnams kyang ste /
T02TD1785E:184b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par brtson pas lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig 'di las de 'da' bar mi mdzad do //
T02TD1785E:184b-25: gsang ba 'dus par rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:184b-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:184b-27: sangs rgyas thams cad ni sku rdo rje'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
T02TD1785E:184b-28: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni nyams su blang bar bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:185a-0: de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las @185a * //
T02TD1785E:185a-2: bshang gci zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:185a-3: bshad ba la sogs pa la smad cing bshung ba nyid du sngags pas mi bya'o //
T02TD1785E:185a-4: de bas na cho ga bzhin du ste 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD1785E:185a-5: bdud rtsi gang yang dag par bskyed pa ste rtag tu bza' bar bya zhing nye bar spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:185a-7: gsang 'di rdo rje gsum byung yin //
T02TD1785E:185a-9: lus dang ngag dang yid bde bar gnas par byed pa'i bcud kyis len to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD1785E:185a-10: de nyid las brtsams te gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:185a-11: khams gsum dag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:185a-12: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i bud med ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi khams gsum gyi lam ni nyams dga' ba ste /
T02TD1785E:185a-13: khams gsum ni sems can rnams so //
T02TD1785E:185a-14: de rnams kyi lam ni bgrod par bya ba yin pas na /
T02TD1785E:185a-15: khams gsum gyi lam ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam ste padma'o //
T02TD1785E:185a-16: der nyams dga' ba ni 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa'o //
T02TD1785E:185a-17: thams cad ni 'dod pa'i gdugs dang zla ba gang ba dang /
T02TD1785E:185a-18: rus sbal gyi rgyab lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rtsa sbubs thams cad cho ga bzhin te /
T02TD1785E:185a-19: rjes su mnyes par byed pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang bcas pas /
T02TD1785E:185a-20: ngag gi rdo rje ste ro 'dzin gyi bya bas bskyod la kun tu longs spyod cing dga' bar bya'o //
T02TD1785E:185a-21: de las byung ba rnams smad par mi bya zhing brtsal ba las byung ba de yongs su spang bar mi bya ste /
T02TD1785E:185a-22: myang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD1785E:185a-23: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD1785E:185a-24: thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD1785E:185a-25: rdo rje sku gsum la gnas pa //
T02TD1785E:185a-27: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1785E:185a-28: dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun //
T02TD1785E:185a-30: padma can zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bud med rnams so ;
T02TD1785E:185a-31: / de rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis //
T02TD1785E:185a-33: bdag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba rnams kyis mgu zhing dga' bar bya'o //
T02TD1785E:185a-34: thugs kyi rdo rje mi smad do //
T02TD1785E:185a-36: de rnams kyi thugs 'byung bar mi bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:185a-37: sems kyi rtsa bar gyur pa ni lus yin la /
T02TD1785E:185b-0: lus kyi rtsa @185b bar gyur pa byang chub kyi sems yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T02TD1785E:185b-1: rdo rje dam tshig gsum ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dam tshig go //
T02TD1785E:185b-2: thun mong ma yin pas na chen po ste de ston par mdzad pas rdo rje 'chang chen po des de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ste sdud par byed pa'i tshig go //
T02TD1785E:185b-3: spyod pa gsum la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis /
T02TD1785E:185b-4: phyi rol gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par zhen pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1785E:185b-5: bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:185b-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:185b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni dus gsum gyi rgyal ba rnams te des bstan pa'o //
T02TD1785E:185b-8: dman pa la mos pa rnams las pa bar bya ba yin pas na /
T02TD1785E:185b-9: gsang ba'i rdo rje ste de ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:185b-10: mdor na zhes bya ba ni rigs brgya mdor bsdus na rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags pa /
T02TD1785E:185b-11: de ni phung po lnga ste /
T02TD1785E:185b-12: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa la gzhan ma yin no //
T02TD1785E:185b-13: de las ma gtogs pa'i phyi rol na gzung bar bya ba sa'i snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do zhes rtog par byed pa de bzlog par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:185b-14: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:185b-15: yul 'dzin par byed pa la gtso bor gyur pas na /
T02TD1785E:185b-16: rdo rje ste dbang po rnams so //
T02TD1785E:185b-17: de'i skye mched ni gnas te mig la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni /
T02TD1785E:185b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:185b-19: sa'i snying po la sogs pa rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyi 'khor lo gang yin pa de dag kyang /
T02TD1785E:185b-20: dbang po nyid las gzhan na byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD1785E:185b-21: gang spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa rnams rang gi lhar mngon pa zhen pa de rdzogs pa'i thabs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:185b-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:185b-23: khams gsum ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten du grags pa srid pa gsum mo //
T02TD1785E:185b-24: gang gis kun tu bsags shing nges par skyed par byed pa de ni /
T02TD1785E:185b-25: khams gsum bsags pa sta sa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:186a-0: de kun du 'od gsal bar 'jug pa dang @186a * //
T02TD1785E:186a-1: gnas pas na rdo rje ste de phyung bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD1785E:186a-2: sa la sogs pa gang yin pa rnams spyan la sogs par yongs su brtags pa ni /
T02TD1785E:186a-3: zin pa dang ma zin pa'i sa'i khams la sogs pa las spyan la sogs pa gang na med pa'o //
T02TD1785E:186a-4: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:186a-5: mkha' dbyings rdo rje ni nam mkha'i khams so //
T02TD1785E:186a-6: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad la mnyam par khyab cing rjes su 'gro bas na /
T02TD1785E:186a-7: dam tshig ste de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa yin /
T02TD1785E:186a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni /
T02TD1785E:186a-10: phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:186a-11: gnas ni spyan la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid sa la sogs pa'i khams lnga ste de rnams kyi dbang phyug rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD1785E:186a-12: de ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid du bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:186a-13: 'khor rnams la zhu ba'i skabs dbye ba'i don du bzhugs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:186a-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:186a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1785E:186a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:186a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1785E:186a-18: sa'i snying po la sogs pa dang spyan la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:186a-19: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni phung po lnga la sogs pa dang gnyis su med pa nyid do //
T02TD1785E:186a-20: de la bzhugs pa ni ston pa ste /
T02TD1785E:186a-21: ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la thugs rtse gcig tu snyoms par zhugs par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:186a-22: snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bsdus te /
T02TD1785E:186a-23: phung po lnga la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa la gzigs nas cad mi gsung bar gyur pa ste /
T02TD1785E:186a-24: zhu ba'i skabs phye bar mdzad nas don dam pa'i bden pa la zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD1785E:186b-0: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yongs su mkhyen nas ston pa po'i yul la ngo bo nyid @186b shes bar bya ba la som nyi skyes nas /
T02TD1785E:186b-1: bcom ldan 'das mi snang bar gyur pas zhur med pa dang /
T02TD1785E:186b-2: 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ji ltar 'dri ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:186b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:186b-4: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:186b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1785E:186b-6: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba ni /
T02TD1785E:186b-7: de kho na nyid de ston pa'i gzhung bsdus pa ni 'dus pa ste /
T02TD1785E:186b-8: der dbang bskur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang zhing bdag por mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:186b-9: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod pa ston pas na slob dpon te /
T02TD1785E:186b-10: bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces pa khyed rnams dang /
T02TD1785E:186b-11: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis zhes pa bdag cag rnams kyis ji ltar rnam pa gang gis blta bar bya zhing shes par bgyi zhes byams pas bskul ba dang /
T02TD1785E:186b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa ni rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:186b-13: ston pa po de ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bzhin du blta zhes pa ste /
T02TD1785E:186b-14: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar blta bar bya zhing shes par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:186b-16: byang chub kyi sems dang ste rdo rje 'chang chen po dang /
T02TD1785E:186b-17: slob dpon ni mi bskyod pa ste gnyis po 'di dag ni rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med de /
T02TD1785E:186b-18: rgyu dang 'bras bu tha mi dad cing rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis dbyer med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:186b-19: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:186b-20: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba ni byams pa la pod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:186b-21: mdor bstan na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:186b-22: shin tu mdor bsdus na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:186b-23: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na zhes bya ba ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na /
T02TD1785E:186b-24: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa ji snyed 'khod cing bzhugs pa rnams kyi chos kyi skus mi g-yo bas na 'khod pa dang /
T02TD1785E:186b-25: longs spyod pa'i skus 'tsho ba ste 'og min gyi gnas na rgyun mi 'chad bar chos ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:187a-0: @187a * // skyong ba ni sprul pa'i skus sems can rnams mtho ris dang thar pa thob par mdzad pa ste /
T02TD1785E:187a-1: de rnams dus gsum du byon nas gsang ba 'dus pa ston pa'i slob dpon de la /
T02TD1785E:187a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pas zhes bya ba /
T02TD1785E:187a-3: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD1785E:187a-4: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang 'gro zhing 'di skad du /
T02TD1785E:187a-5: bdag cag gi pha'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi tshogs 'byin cing smra'o //
T02TD1785E:187a-6: 'di lta ste dper na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02TD1785E:187a-7: 'jigs shing skrag pa'i rgyun slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bya zhes the tshom gyi tshig tu mchod pa'i gnas la /
T02TD1785E:187a-8: som nyi skye ba nyes pa chen po yod pa de'i phyir byams pa cang mi smra bar gyur to //
T02TD1785E:187a-9: de ltar byams pa cang mi smra bar gyur pas lan ma thob pa dang /
T02TD1785E:187a-10: yang don de nyid bskul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:187a-11: de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos nas /
T02TD1785E:187a-12: slar yang rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang gi ngo bo nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa gang yin pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:187a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:187a-14: rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:187a-15: rdo rje ni bstan du med pa'i de kho na nyid de drug pa'o //
T02TD1785E:187a-16: de 'byin pa dang 'jug pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par mdzad pas na /
T02TD1785E:187a-17: rdo rje 'chang ba ste dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'o //
T02TD1785E:187a-18: de'i dngos grub kyi dam tshig ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02TD1785E:187a-19: dngos grub kyi dam tshig kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas dngos grub kyi dam tshig thams cad do //
T02TD1785E:187a-20: de la dmigs pa ni mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:187a-21: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1785E:187a-22: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la mi bskyod pa la sogs pas /
T02TD1785E:187a-23: byang chub sems dpa' khyed ces bya ba la sogs pas bka' stsal to //
T02TD1785E:187a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gang zhus pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:187a-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:187b-0: de bzhin gshegs @187b pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub rnams zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:187b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi sprul pa'i sku /
T02TD1785E:187b-2: gang na bzhugs zhes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis zhus pa'o //
T02TD1785E:187b-3: sku gsum gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang yid la gnas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:187b-4: mi bskyod pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs la gnas so zhes lan gsungs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:187b-5: lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje gang la gnas zhes bya ba ni zhus pa'o //
T02TD1785E:187b-6: gang la yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba ni lan te /
T02TD1785E:187b-7: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la gnas so zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD1785E:187b-8: lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la gnas so zhes bya ba de ni /
T02TD1785E:187b-9: bshad par bya ba yin pa las gang la yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni de ni 'di yin no zhes bstan par mi nus te /
T02TD1785E:187b-10: bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:187b-11: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar the tshom dang bral ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:187b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:187b-13: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni ston pa po la'o //
T02TD1785E:187b-14: rmad du gyur pa ni de'i rgyu la'o //
T02TD1785E:187b-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02TD1785E:187b-16: gang na yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi gzhung gi tshogs kyis /
T02TD1785E:187b-17: ji ltar rdzogs par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis /
T02TD1785E:187b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po mi bskyod pa gsang ba 'dus pa'i ston pa por gyur pas /
T02TD1785E:187b-19: mchod par bya ba dang bla mar bya ba yin pas bdag cag rnams kyi pha'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig snyan pas mngon par bstod de /
T02TD1785E:187b-20: phyi dang nang gi mchod pa rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD1785E:187b-21: de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la yang dag par brten te /
T02TD1785E:187b-22: rgyan rnam pa bdun dang bshad pa'i tshul rnams kyis /
T02TD1785E:187b-23: gang gsang ba 'dus pa rnam par dbye ba de yang ma 'ongs pa'i lag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'chang chen po mngon sum pa bzhin du gus pa bskyed nas mchod pa bya'o zhes 'di'i don ston pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:187b-24: don 'di nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:188a-1: dra ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las /
T02TD1785E:188a-2: slob dpon ji 'drar lta zhe na /
T02TD1785E:188a-3: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD1785E:188a-4: de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang //
T02TD1785E:188a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog / de yi ye shes rgya mtsho che //
T02TD1785E:188a-6: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sbyin //
T02TD1785E:188a-7: slob dpon gyi ni yon tan bzung //
T02TD1785E:188a-8: skyon rnams nam yang ma yin no //
T02TD1785E:188a-9: yon tan gyis ni dngos grub cing //
T02TD1785E:188a-10: skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams //
T02TD1785E:188a-11: de phyir kun nas rab bsgrims te //
T02TD1785E:188a-12: bsam yas 'bras bu smin byed pa //
T02TD1785E:188a-14: sems can dang pas de mchod cig /
T02TD1785E:188a-16: de bzhin du rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo las /
T02TD1785E:188a-17: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje au rgyan gyi ri la bzhugs nas /
T02TD1785E:188a-18: rdo rje theg pa la slob par byed pa thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1785E:188a-19: rdo rje theg pa ma lus pa la slob par byed pa rnams nyon cig /
T02TD1785E:188a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te mi mthong na yang /
T02TD1785E:188a-21: rdo rje slob dpon rdo rje bla ma de 'di ltar ston par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang /
T02TD1785E:188a-22: de bzhin du stong phrag brgya pa las kyang /
T02TD1785E:188a-23: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la nye bar brten pas so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:188a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD1785E:188a-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhu ba'i dus su 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can du gyur to //
T02TD1785E:188a-26: de'i 'og tu phyag na rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:188a-27: gsang ba'i rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
T02TD1785E:188a-28: de ting nge 'dzin gang du gnas shing thim par gyur pa de ni gsang ba'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02TD1785E:188a-29: yang dag pa'i mtha' ste de las bzhengs nas yang snga ma bzhin du zhe sdang rdo rjer gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams la nyon cig ces bos te /
T02TD1785E:188a-30: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad do //
T02TD1785E:188a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po rnams so //
T02TD1785E:188a-32: de'i byang chub kyi sems 'byung zhing skye bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD1785E:188a-33: rnam par mi 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1785E:188b-0: yid kyi dkyil 'khor @188b nyon cig ces bos par gyur pa dang /
T02TD1785E:188b-1: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gis yang dag par dga' bar gyur nas /
T02TD1785E:188b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ji lta ba bzhin du gsol ba 'debs par gyur pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:188b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:188b-4: de gsan nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
T02TD1785E:188b-5: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:188b-6: nam mkha'i dbyings ni nam mkha'i khams te /
T02TD1785E:188b-7: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa'o //
T02TD1785E:188b-8: gru bzhi lha ma pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:188b-9: zur bzhi ni sa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid spyan la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni gru bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1785E:188b-10: rab tu mdzes zhes pa ni /
T02TD1785E:188b-11: sku'i dkyil 'khor tha mal pa ma yin par bsam pa'o //
T02TD1785E:188b-12: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1785E:188b-15: gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid can gyi lus de nyid de /
T02TD1785E:188b-16: de'i bdag nyid can gyi sbyor ba'i thing nge 'dzin to //
T02TD1785E:188b-17: des bsam gtan rdo rje zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis bsam zhing bsgom par bya ba yin pas na bsam gtan te mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:188b-18: drug pa dang sbyor bar gyur pas rdo rje'o //
T02TD1785E:188b-19: de rab bskul bya zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:188b-20: spro ba dang bsdu bas bdag nyid dang chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig tu bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD1785E:188b-21: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1785E:188b-22: der lha rnams dgod pa'i rim pa ni bsam gtan te /
T02TD1785E:188b-23: des rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pas 'khor lo can kun zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:188b-24: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bzhugs par bya zhes bya ba ste gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:188b-25: de ltar thun mong gi sku'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ci zhig bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:188b-26: mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:188b-27: cho ga de nyid kyis zhes bya ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga nyid kyis /
T02TD1785E:188b-28: blo dang ldan pa ste rang gi phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu mchod pa zhes bya ba snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can brtag par bya zhing nyams su blang bar bya'o //
T02TD1785E:189a-0: mchod pa brtsams pa nyid kyis slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes bya ba bstan par bya ba'i @189a * //
T02TD1785E:189a-2: slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:189a-3: rang gi spyod pa spyad pas rang gi gnas 'thob cing reg par 'gyur bas na slob dpon te rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02TD1785E:189a-4: de'i snying gar zhes bya ba snying ga'i padma la ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas yid kyi dbang bskur pa brtsam zhing spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:189a-5: sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:189a-6: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zhes bya ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar yang dag par zhugs pas nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba /
T02TD1785E:189a-7: chos 'byung ba yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam zhing de'i dbus su slob ma dbang bskur bar gyur par bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:189a-8: de'i 'og tu rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyis zhes bya ba /
T02TD1785E:189a-9: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pas cho ga bzhin du dbab par bya ste /
T02TD1785E:189a-10: slob ma'i mgo la byang chub kyi sems rdo rjer gyur pa dbab cing babs par bsam mo //
T02TD1785E:189a-11: dbang bskur bar gyur pas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:189a-12: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:189a-13: dbang bskur ba'i mchog 'dis slob ma la dbang bskur na sems can thams cad rjes su 'dzin par 'os pa'i byang chub mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par 'gyur te gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:189a-15: ngo mtshar chen po'i dngos grub kun //
T02TD1785E:189a-17: dngos grub thams cad ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams so //
T02TD1785E:189a-18: de ngo mtshar che zhing khyad par 'thob pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub 'grub cing 'thob po zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:189a-19: bdag gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:189a-20: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad do //
T02TD1785E:189a-21: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa dang sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:189a-22: de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam zhing gcig tu gyur par /
T02TD1785E:189a-23: bsam gtan gang gis gang rdzogs par 'gyur zhing rab tu sbyangs pa'i 'gro ba dbang bskur bar byed pa de ni mi phyed pa'i bsams gtan gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02TD1785E:189b-0: @189b gzhan yang gdug pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i thabs kyi rnam pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:189b-1: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:189b-2: yang zhes bya ba ni le'u bcu gsum pa dang /
T02TD1785E:189b-3: le'u bcu bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i drag po'i las la mngon par dga' ba rnams kyi 'brel pa ston pa yin no ;
T02TD1785E:189b-4: / phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni ston pa'o //
T02TD1785E:189b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:189b-6: thams cad ni skye bo dam pa rnams so //
T02TD1785E:189b-7: de rnams de bzhin nyid du 'chi bar gang 'gro ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02TD1785E:189b-8: gdug pa sems dang ldan pa rnams so ;
T02TD1785E:189b-9: / de rnams kyi rdo rje sbyor ba ni tshar gcad pa'i thabs te /
T02TD1785E:189b-10: de gang du ston pa de ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba zhes pa sku la sogs pa bskyed pa'i yi ge gsum ste /
T02TD1785E:189b-11: rang gi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1785E:189b-13: sha rus la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:189b-14: de la ji srid sgrub pa pos rang gi lus sha dang rus pa dang rtsa rgyus kyi rang bzhin du bltas la /
T02TD1785E:189b-15: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus su gnas pa ste /
T02TD1785E:189b-16: 'od gsal bar zhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:189b-18: sku gsung thugs kyi snying po gsum //
T02TD1785E:189b-19: zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs gsum gyi sa bon gyi yi ge rnam pa gsum ni /
T02TD1785E:189b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba stobs che zhing pha rol gnon pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:189b-21: de nas drag po zhes pa gdug pa rnams kyi sha khrag za bar brtson pa /
T02TD1785E:189b-22: mi sdug cing khros par autpala sngon po dang mdog 'dra bas /
T02TD1785E:189b-23: phyag bzhi par ni cho ga yis //
T02TD1785E:189b-24: zhes bya ba 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshon cha'i tshogs bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:189b-25: de ltar sngags pa mkha' 'gro'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02TD1785E:189b-26: de'i 'og tu ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD1785E:189b-27: 'od zer zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
T02TD1785E:189b-28: /'od zer lnga ni ya ra la wa ha zhes bya ba rlung dang me la sogs pa lnga'i sa bon no //
T02TD1785E:189b-29: de rnams kyi 'od zer ni nag po la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:189b-30: des snang zhing 'bar bar gyur pa rang gi lce rdo rje rtse lnga par brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:189b-31: bsam gtan rdo rje sbyor ba yis//
T02TD1785E:190a-1: bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas bsgom pa'i lce'i rdo rje de ni bsam gtan rdo rje'o //
T02TD1785E:190a-2: de'i sbyor ba ni sa bon lnga brjod nas 'od zer lnga bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar bcug la /
T02TD1785E:190a-3: srin bu padma ltar yan lag thams cad na gnas pa'i khrag drangs la /
T02TD1785E:190a-4: de'i rus pa dang pags pa tsam lhag ma lus bar bsams la 'od zer nye bar bsdus te /
T02TD1785E:190a-5: rang gi lus la rab tu bcug nas bdag nyid la ba rlan par bsam pa ni /
T02TD1785E:190a-6: khrag drang ba'i mchog yin no //
T02TD1785E:190a-7: sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis lag pa na gnas pa'i mtshon cha bshad pa'i sgo nas spyor ba gzhan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:190a-8: rtse gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:190a-9: g-yas kyi dang po la mdung rtse gsum pa /
T02TD1785E:190a-10: gnyis pa la rdo rje gsum pa las drag po mchog dag ces bya ba shin tu yang drag po'i phur bu ste rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T02TD1785E:190a-11: dang po la ni thod pa ste sngar bshad pa nyid do //
T02TD1785E:190a-12: rdo rje'i sbyor bas zhes bya bas sgrub pa pos /
T02TD1785E:190a-13: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag ste /
T02TD1785E:190a-14: de bzhin gsheg pa'i sku dag kyang mtshon cha 'dis btab cing bsnun na /
T02TD1785E:190a-15: tha mal pa'i lus rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes sbyor ba'i phul du byung ba'i khyad par bstan pa'o //
T02TD1785E:190a-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:190a-17: yang zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i bza' ba'i dam tshig snga ma dran par bya ba'o //
T02TD1785E:190a-18: rdo rje ni sgrub pa po ste de'i kha zas kyi dam tshig ni kha zas kyi dus te /
T02TD1785E:190a-19: der bya zhing nyams su blangs ba gang yin pa de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1785E:190a-20: bza' ba ni 'bras chan dang zan dron la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:190a-21: btung ba ni 'o ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:190a-22: brtul zhugs can ni sgrub pa po rnam pa gsum gyis bza' ba'am 'thung ba na de thams cad bshad gci dang sha'i sbyor bas cho ga bzhin du bza' ba ste /
T02TD1785E:190a-23: snying ga dang lkog ma yongs su sbyang ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD1785E:190a-24: bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'byor ba sha dang khu ba la sogs pa yongs su gyur par bsams la /
T02TD1785E:190a-25: lhag ma rnams bshang ba dang gci ba'i dngos por yongs su brtag par bya ste /
T02TD1785E:190a-26: 'di ni nang gi sbyin sreg go //
T02TD1785E:190a-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:190b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @190b ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems can thams cad de /
T02TD1785E:190b-1: 'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid //
T02TD1785E:190b-3: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchod pa'i mchog ni mchod pa'i khyad par te /
T02TD1785E:190b-4: de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo//
T02TD1785E:190b-5: mchod pa'i yo byad lnga ni yul rnam pa lda'o //
T02TD1785E:190b-6: de rnams kyi mchod pa'i mchog ni yid du 'ong ba'i yul rnams te /
T02TD1785E:190b-7: des bdag dang gzhan rnams la mchod par bya ba'i cho ga 'di ni /
T02TD1785E:190b-8: rdo rje thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis so //
T02TD1785E:190b-9: dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o //
T02TD1785E:190b-10: zhes bya ba 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig go //
T02TD1785E:190b-11: de ltar thun mong gi mchod pa bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:190b-12: khyad par gyi mchod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:190b-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:190b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams car ces bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa ste /
T02TD1785E:190b-15: 'di rnams kyi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi mchod pa gsang zhig sbas pa phyung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:190b-16: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1785E:190b-18: rdo rje dang padma yang dag par sbyar bas so //
T02TD1785E:190b-19: bdag gis khu ba la sogs pa smos pas ni /
T02TD1785E:190b-20: rang gi khu ba'i rdul chen po mer mer po la sogs par gyur par legs par bsams la /
T02TD1785E:190b-21: bu dang tsha bol sogs pa cho ga bzhin du zhes pa /
T02TD1785E:190b-22: bsrung ba dang gso ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams kyis mchod cing yang dag par blang bar bya ste /
T02TD1785E:190b-23: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bar 'gyur ro zhes ba'o //
T02TD1785E:190b-24: de ltar bdag dang gzhan la mchod pa bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:190b-25: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams la mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:190b-26: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:190b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1785E:190b-28: ji ltar skye ba'i tshe 'ongs pa rnam par 'jig pa na de bzhin du 'gro bas na /
T02TD1785E:190b-29: de bzhin gsheg pa ste sems can thams cad do //
T02TD1785E:190b-30: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdom pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:190b-31: rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyi sngom pa ni rjes su bzung ba ste /
T02TD1785E:190b-32: de bcom ldan 'das kyi nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1785E:190b-33: sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi //
T02TD1785E:191a-0: sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'i sems can gyi tshogs rnams @191a * //
T02TD1785E:191a-2: / ma rnams la zhes bya ba ni spyan te /
T02TD1785E:191a-5: ji lta bu zhe na dam tshig 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:191a-6: sems can rnams skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid can gsum gyi gnas skabs ni dam tshig ste de 'dzin par byed pas na dam tshig 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1785E:191a-7: dam tshig 'dzin pa de ni sems can gyi khams ma lus pa dang bcas pa'i sa spyad par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:191a-8: dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rjes spyad //
T02TD1785E:191a-10: bdag nyid kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba dge ba /
T02TD1785E:191a-11: phan zhing bde ba dang nye bar ldan pas spyad par bya zhing dga' bar bya la rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1785E:191a-12: dam tshig 'di ni gsang ba 'dus pa rnams kyi rmad po che ste /
T02TD1785E:191a-13: sems can gyi tshogs chen po yongs su 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir phul du byung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:191a-14: de ltar mchod pa'i rnam pa bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:191a-15: de rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:191a-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:191a-17: bshad ma thag pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pas /
T02TD1785E:191a-18: byang chub kyi phyogs su 'gyur bas na de rnams yang dag par bzung ba ni sngom pa'o //
T02TD1785E:191a-19: de'i snying po ni rdo rje ste de phyung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:191a-20: lus dang ngag sems longs spyod ni //
T02TD1785E:191a-22: mchod pa'i cho ga rnams la gang lus la sogs pa'i bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:191a-23: de gsang ba gsum gnas rdo rje skyes //
T02TD1785E:191a-25: 'od gsal ba las yang dag par 'byung bar lhag par mos par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag ma'o //
T02TD1785E:191a-26: de ltar lhag par mos nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02TD1785E:191a-27: bzang po bdag gis bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1785E:191a-29: bzang po ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam /
T02TD1785E:191a-31: bdag gis bsgrub par bya ba ni thob par bya ba'o zhes brtan pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:191a-32: gal te de ltar ma byas na de'i tshe cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02TD1785E:191a-35: byang chub kyi tshogs thams cad du 'bras bu med par byed de /
T02TD1785E:191a-36: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:191a-37: de ltar rnal 'byor bas sems can rnams kyi yul la rab tu 'jug pa bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:191a-38: yang bdag nyid kyi lus brta bar bya ba'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:191a-39: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:191b-0: sangs @191b rgyas nyid la sogs pa 'dis sgrub par byed pas na /
T02TD1785E:191b-1: sgrub pa po thams cad de rang gi lus so //
T02TD1785E:191b-2: de'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa ni /
T02TD1785E:191b-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa gang gis rdo rje sems dpa' skyed par byed pa ste de phyung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:191b-4: mtho gang tsam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:191b-5: rang gi mgo bo'i steng gi nam mkha' la yi ge bam yongs su gyur pa las yang dag par byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya zhing dang por bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:191b-6: de'i 'og tu yi ge aom 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bsams la /
T02TD1785E:191b-7: bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya ste 'chi bar mi 'gyur bas na bdud rtsi ste /
T02TD1785E:191b-8: bdud rtsi lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02TD1785E:191b-9: de rnams dbab par bya ba ni 'od zer lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyis spyi bo nas rkang ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1785E:191b-10: rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02TD1785E:191b-11: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa 'dis /
T02TD1785E:191b-12: skad cig gis ni zhes bya ba ring por mi thogs par gzi can 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T02TD1785E:191b-13: lus gzi mdangs dang ldan zhing /
T02TD1785E:191b-14: lus dang ngag dang sems bde bar gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ni phan yon no //
T02TD1785E:191b-15: rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtog par gyur cing /
T02TD1785E:191b-16: phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi 'jug pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:191b-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:191b-18: sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba gang yin pa de ni sngags thams cad de gsang ba 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1785E:191b-19: de 'dzin par byed pas na sngags 'dzin pa thams cad de /
T02TD1785E:191b-20: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po'o //
T02TD1785E:191b-21: de'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba ni /
T02TD1785E:191b-22: lus la sogs pa'i 'jug pa gsang ba ste de nyid kyi sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1785E:191b-23: mchod rten dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs las /
T02TD1785E:191b-24: mchod rten gyi las ni sa dang bye ma la sogs pa las mchod rten gyi mchod pa'i las mi bya ste /
T02TD1785E:191b-25: bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:191b-26: mchod rten gyi mchod pa la mngon par zhen pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:191b-27: glegs bam bklag pa'ang mi bya zhing //
T02TD1785E:192a-2: lhun gyis grub pa nyid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa la rab tu 'jug gi /
T02TD1785E:192a-3: gzhan du 'jug pa la sogs pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:192a-5: dkyil 'khor dag kyang yongs mi bri //
T02TD1785E:192a-7: phyi'i dkyil 'khor mi bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:192a-8: rang gi lus dkyil 'khor du bshad pas phyi'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid du med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:192a-9: rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi bya'o //
T02TD1785E:192a-11: rdo rje mchog gsum na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD1785E:192a-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
T02TD1785E:192a-13: de rnams la lus la sogs pa'i rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag mi bya ste /
T02TD1785E:192a-14: bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du gyur pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:192a-15: de dag thams cad ni 'jig rten gyis btags pa la brten nas mngon par zhen pa med pas bya ba la ni 'gal ba med do //
T02TD1785E:192a-16: le'u bco lnga ba las gsungs pa'i las phra mo'i lhag ma bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:192a-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:192a-18: dug thams cad ni sems med pa dang sems yod pa'i rnam pa mang po //
T02TD1785E:192a-19: de'i 'byin pa la sogs pa sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1785E:192a-20: de ni 'di lta ste 'od zer dkar po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:192a-21: aom dkar po las byung ba'i 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'i lte ba la dug gis phog pa 'khor lo'i dbus su gzhag la /
T02TD1785E:192a-22: mdog 'od zer ser po kun nas 'khrigs pa'i dug gi gzi brjid ser po rnams kyis /
T02TD1785E:192a-23: lus ma lus pa khyab pa la 'khor lo dkar po nyid kyis mo gnas mnan te /
T02TD1785E:192a-24: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis rim gyis rim gyis /
T02TD1785E:192a-25: 'od zer ser po bsal bar bya bar bsams la dug med par bya ste 'di ni dug bsal ba'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1785E:192a-26: ser po lta bur bsgom par bya //
T02TD1785E:192a-28: 'di dag thams cad gnon pa'i bsam pas kha dog ser por bsam par bya ste /
T02TD1785E:192a-29: 'di ni dug gnon pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1785E:192a-30: 'di dag thams cad du ba'i mdog can du bsams la /
T02TD1785E:192a-31: gang du 'dod pa der spo bar bya ste /
T02TD1785E:192a-32: 'di ni dug 'dren pa'i cho ga bshad par gyur pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:192a-33: rdor gsum 'od zer dam tshig gis //
T02TD1785E:192a-35: dkar po dang ser po dang dud ka'i 'od zer gyi sbyor bas so //
T02TD1785E:192b-0: sa bon gsang @192b gsum las byung ba'o //
T02TD1785E:192b-2: gsang ba las byung ba'i sa bon yi ge aom 'di /
T02TD1785E:192b-3: dug 'byin pa la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas par yin par shes par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:192b-4: de ltar dug bsal ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i sngags ba bsrung pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:192b-5: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:192b-6: lus dang ngag dang sems bsrung ba'i phyir 'khor lo ste /
T02TD1785E:192b-7: de'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa ni sngags kyi snying po ste /
T02TD1785E:192b-8: de sku la sogs pa las phyung ngo //
T02TD1785E:192b-9: dang po aom dang ldan zhing tha mar phat yod pa'i sngags 'di ni ming mtha' med ces bya ste /
T02TD1785E:192b-10: sngags 'di gro ga la sogs pa la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02TD1785E:192b-11: las kyi rdo rje la gnas par //
T02TD1785E:192b-13: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas par bri ba'o //
T02TD1785E:192b-14: ham ni dbus su bzhag nas su //
T02TD1785E:192b-16: 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas par yi ge ham bri ba'o //
T02TD1785E:192b-17: ming ni dbus su bri bar bya //
T02TD1785E:192b-19: de'i nang du bsrung bar bya ba'i ming bri ba'o //
T02TD1785E:192b-20: sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis //
T02TD1785E:192b-22: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02TD1785E:192b-23: brgyan te rtag tu gzhag par bya //
T02TD1785E:192b-25: rim bzhin du 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la brgyan nas rtag tu ste /
T02TD1785E:192b-26: dus thams cad du za ma tog la sogs par legs par bzhag nas mchod par bya ste /
T02TD1785E:192b-28: gnyis pa la hu lu hu lu /
T02TD1785E:192b-31: lnga pa la ha na ha na /
T02TD1785E:192b-32: drug pa la da ha da ha /
T02TD1785E:192b-33: bdun pa la aa mri te /
T02TD1785E:192b-34: rtsibs brgyad pa la h'um phat ces bri ba ste /
T02TD1785E:192b-35: 'di ni sngags kyi yig dgod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:192b-36: sngags kyi yi ge dgod pa 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi zhes bya ba /
T02TD1785E:192b-37: sgrub pa po rnams kyi gsang ba gsum gyi zhes bya ba /
T02TD1785E:192b-38: sku dang gsung dang thugs te de'i gnas ni bsrung ba bsdus shing btus pa'o //
T02TD1785E:192b-39: de ni las kyi mtha' rdo rje aanydza na'i sbyor ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:192b-40: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:192b-41: dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la mi slu bas na rdo rje aanydza na'o //
T02TD1785E:192b-42: de nyid phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas ni /
T02TD1785E:192b-43: gnas zhes pa ni rten te de phyang ngo //
T02TD1785E:192b-44: lam gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02TD1785E:193a-0: @193a * // sgrub pa po'i gnas te lam gyi bzhi mdo la sogs pa ni grags par zad do //
T02TD1785E:193a-1: rdo rje aanydza na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:193a-2: man ngag ni 'di yin te bdud rtsi lnga la spangs pa'i padma'i skud pa las sdod bu byas la /
T02TD1785E:193a-3: thod pa'i sgyed pu'i dbus na gnas pa'i zhag gis bkang pa'i thod pa'i nang du bzhag la /
T02TD1785E:193a-4: de'i steng du chang gis bkang ba'i thod pa bzhag la /
T02TD1785E:193a-5: bshad ma thag pa'i 'khor lo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas /
T02TD1785E:193a-6: 'byung po'i nyin zhag gi nam phyed na thod pa'i stan la gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos /
T02TD1785E:193a-7: bka'i 'khor lo spyod pa'i cho gas srung ba byas lo dud pa dbab par bya ste /
T02TD1785E:193a-8: rdo rje aanydza na'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1785E:193a-9: de nas du ba blangs la za ma tog tu legs par bzhag ste /
T02TD1785E:193a-10: de nyid la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab cing bzlas na /
T02TD1785E:193a-11: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste /
T02TD1785E:193a-12: dngos grub rnam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02TD1785E:193a-13: de la mi snang ba ni mchog go //
T02TD1785E:193a-14: sa 'og na gnas pa'i gter mthong ba ni 'bring ngo //
T02TD1785E:193a-15: dbang du byed pa ni tha ma'i zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:193a-16: de nas sdud par byed pas rgyud kyi che ba nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bstod pa smras pa ni /
T02TD1785E:193a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis /
T02TD1785E:193a-18: phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1785E:193a-19: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge du dang ldan na /
T02TD1785E:193a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig thos nas /
T02TD1785E:193a-22: zhes bcom ldan 'das la zhus par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1785E:193a-23: de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:193a-24: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum dang ldan na //
T02TD1785E:193a-25: byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de la dad cing bsgom par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni lan no //
T02TD1785E:193a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa /
T02TD1785E:193b-0: gsum po gang zhig lags zhes bya ba ni yang zhus @193b pa'o //
T02TD1785E:193b-1: rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1785E:193b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang /
T02TD1785E:193b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang /
T02TD1785E:193b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thags rdo rje ste de gsum mo zhes bya ba ni lan no //
T02TD1785E:193b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:193b-6: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams the tshom dang bral bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD1785E:193b-7: gzhan yang rgyud rnyed par dka' ba nyid bstan pas dad pa rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:193b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bos pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:193b-9: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos /
T02TD1785E:193b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD1785E:193b-11: byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1785E:193b-12: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngon byung ba na brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal ba yang 'das nas /
T02TD1785E:193b-13: gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'das pa nas /
T02TD1785E:193b-14: thub pa chen po 'od srungs mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:193b-16: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas kyi don bshad pa de /
T02TD1785E:193b-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:193b-18: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD1785E:193b-19: 'das pa'i tshul gyis gtam bsdus pa yin te /
T02TD1785E:193b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srungs yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du ma byung bar bstan pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:193b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD1785E:193b-23: ci'i phyir ma gsungs pa'i rgyu 'dir gsungs pa yin te /
T02TD1785E:193b-24: dus de srid kyi bar du ni sems can rnams dman pa la lhag par mos shing /
T02TD1785E:193b-25: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyis 'dul ba /
T02TD1785E:193b-26: zab mo bstan pas skrag pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin te /
T02TD1785E:194a-0: de bas na skal ba med pas de'i @194a * //
T02TD1785E:194a-1: tshe gsang ba chen po'i don bshad pa ma gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:194a-2: dus 'dir ni sems can 'dod chags la spyod cing snyigs ma lnga bod pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi mos ba mkhyen nas byon te /
T02TD1785E:194a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gis gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:194a-4: 'on kyang sangs rgyas nyid 'dis 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes 'ga' zhig rtog par 'gyur bas de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:194a-5: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la /
T02TD1785E:194a-6: skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do//
T02TD1785E:194a-7: gang ga'i klung gi bye ma du ma snyed kyi bskal bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de gsang ba 'dus pa la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la /
T02TD1785E:194a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro zhing /
T02TD1785E:194a-9: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyid kyis rdzogs par byed do zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1785E:194a-10: nang gi mngon par byang chub pa'i rim gyis don dam pa'i bden pa la zhugs nas /
T02TD1785E:194a-11: rnyog pa'i dri ma thams cad bkrus te skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang /
T02TD1785E:194a-12: mig 'dzums pa tsam gyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas langs nas /
T02TD1785E:194a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1785E:194a-14: gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la de kho na nyid rtogs pa rnams mthong ba'i chos nyid la /
T02TD1785E:194a-15: tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob pa thos shing /
T02TD1785E:194a-16: rgyud kyi gzhung ma lus par thos kyang mtha' drug gi tshig gi dbye bas /
T02TD1785E:194a-17: rgyud kyi don la rmongs pa dang ma bral ba tsan na lta bu'i gang zag la sogs pa'i nyan pa po rnams sems ji lta ba bzhin du rangs pa ma thob par gyur pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:194a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu rus so zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:194a-19: de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i yid kyis dbang po dman pa rnams rab tu du bar gzigs nas /
T02TD1785E:194b-0: rin po che lta bu'i gang zag phyogs gnyi ga la 'jigs pa med @194b pa ji ltar dbugs 'byin par byed pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:194b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD1785E:194b-2: byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma du shig / sdug bsngal gsum la ma sgoms shig ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:194b-3: de ltar rin po che lta bu'i gang zag gis tsandan lta bu'i gang zag la dbugs phyung nas /
T02TD1785E:194b-4: bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur pa ji lta ba bzhin du gsol ba 'debs pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:194b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la /
T02TD1785E:194b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1785E:194b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar mi du bar bgyi /
T02TD1785E:194b-8: ji ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi sgom par bgyi //
T02TD1785E:194b-10: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge de bstan pa'i ming tsam thos pa'i skal ba yang ma mchis so zhes bya ba gsol te /
T02TD1785E:194b-11: sdug bsngal gsum zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:194b-12: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
T02TD1785E:194b-15: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gsum mo //
T02TD1785E:194b-16: gsang ba'i yi ge zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:194b-17: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni gsang ba gsum ste yi de'i don to //
T02TD1785E:194b-18: yi ge gsum ni gsang ba gsum ste spyi'i don to //
T02TD1785E:194b-19: 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba gsum ni gsang ba gsum ste sbas pa'o //
T02TD1785E:194b-20: shes rab dang thabs dang nye bar thob pa gsum ni gsang pa gsum ste ;
T02TD1785E:194b-22: gsang ba'i yi ge gsum po de dag 'di ltar rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:194b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bka' stsal ba /
T02TD1785E:194b-24: rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig / yi ge ni thun mong ste /
T02TD1785E:194b-25: rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du /
T02TD1785E:194b-26: nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang /
T02TD1785E:194b-27: rigs kyi bu gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag ma thos shing mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1785E:194b-29: gsang ba'i yi ge gsum rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:195a-1: byang chub sems dpa' de dag cang mi sma bar gyur to zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:195a-2: khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes ma thos pa gang yin pa de /
T02TD1785E:195a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD1785E:195a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang 'di ni thun mong ngo //
T02TD1785E:195a-5: ci'i phyir gsang ba'i yi ge de ma thob ce na /
T02TD1785E:195a-6: gzung bar bya ba med pas ma thob cing 'dzin pa po med pas mngon par sangs ma rgyas so //
T02TD1785E:195a-8: gsang ba'i yi ge rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:195a-9: gsang ba'i yi ge ni 'od gsal ba ste des rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis /
T02TD1785E:195a-10: de kho na nyid gsal bar mdzad pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:195a-11: de ltar mgo smos pas go ba rin po che lta bu'i gang zag gis tsandan lta bu la sogs pa'i gang zag rnams kyi shes rab kyi rab rib kyi som nyi rnam par bsal nas /
T02TD1785E:195a-12: de kho na nyid mngon par rtogs shing shin tu sbyangs pas /
T02TD1785E:195a-13: gnas skabs gang 'thob par 'gyur ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:195a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes bya ba gsungs te dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:195a-15: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis the tshom dang bral ba rgyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de'i 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:195a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po drug pa'i bdag nyid du ji ltar gyur pa da bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:195a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad /
T02TD1785E:195a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mo'i bha ga la bzhugs so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:195a-20: de ltar 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can rdo rje 'chang chen po la /
T02TD1785E:195a-21: btsun mo bzhi de dang bral bas gdung ba'i yid kyis blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:195a-22: snying rje dang bcas pas ji ltar smre ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:195a-23: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mos /
T02TD1785E:195a-24: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la dga' bas bstod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:195b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par @195b snang mdzad de /
T02TD1785E:195b-1: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi btsun mo ni spyan te /
T02TD1785E:195b-2: dga' bas snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pas bstod pa byed pa ste drug ldan la sogs pa sgeg cing snyan pa'i sna glu'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa sngon du 'gro bas skul bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1785E:195b-3: sems can khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:195b-4: sems can khams na zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:195b-5: sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pas so //
T02TD1785E:195b-6: gnas kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba ni khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal srid brnyes ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:195b-7: khyod ni zhes bya ba ni mdun na gnas pa bzhin du bltas te smre ba'o //
T02TD1785E:195b-8: rdo rje thugs zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:195b-9: thugs dbang du gyur pa brnyes pa'o //
T02TD1785E:195b-11: de'i yid du 'ong bas tshim pa skyed pas na dga' ba yid 'ong ngo //
T02TD1785E:195b-12: don chen ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02TD1785E:195b-13: de 'dod cing bskyed pas na don chen 'dod pa ste /
T02TD1785E:195b-14: de lta bu'i dga' ba yid du 'ong ba'i don chen 'dod pas 'khyud pa la sogs pas /
T02TD1785E:195b-15: bdag la bskyab tu gsol zhing rol par mdzod cig pa'o //
T02TD1785E:195b-16: mgon po zhes bya ba ni bdag po ste /
T02TD1785E:195b-17: gal te de ring bdag gson zhing 'tsho bar mchis par bzhed na /
T02TD1785E:195b-18: sems can thams cad skyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas yab yin zhing /
T02TD1785E:195b-19: sems can rnams kyi phan pa dang bde pa byed pas sems can gyi gnyen gyi mchog chen pos bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhing rol par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o //
T02TD1785E:195b-20: yang m'a ma k'i'i bskul ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:195b-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te //
T02TD1785E:195b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:195b-23: de'i btsun mo ni 'phags ma m'a ma k'i'o //
T02TD1785E:195b-24: rdo rje 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i mchod pa'i mchog ni /
T02TD1785E:195b-25: tha ma la pa ma yin pa'i khyad par gyi shin tu dga' ba la zhugs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:195b-26: de ston pa'i yi ge'i tshig gis bstod par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1785E:195b-27: rdo rje'i sku khyod ces bya ba ni mi 'jig pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:195b-28: bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la phan //
T02TD1785E:195b-30: khyod ni sems can la rjes su phan par mdzad pa'i bka'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-1: don du byang chub don dam rjes su phan ston pa //
T02TD1785E:196a-3: sangs rgyas ni phung po lnga rnams so //
T02TD1785E:196a-4: de rnams kyi don ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-5: byang chub ni don dam pa'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-6: de'i don dam ni de gnyis yang dag par 'dus pa las byung ba'i bde ba chen po'i sku ste /
T02TD1785E:196a-7: de sems can rnams la phan pa'i dgongs pas rab tu ston par mdzad pas na phan pa rjes su ston pa'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-9: 'dod chags rnam par spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:196a-10: dam tshig chags pa ni 'dod chags la spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02TD1785E:196a-11: bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o//
T02TD1785E:196a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02TD1785E:196a-13: 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-14: de'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i spyan ni gos dkar mo ste /
T02TD1785E:196a-15: des rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la bskul ba'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-16: khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:196a-17: ngag gi dbang phyug brnyes pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba ste /
T02TD1785E:196a-18: mchog tu thugs rje che ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1785E:196a-19: de bas na tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis 'jig rten dag gi ste /
T02TD1785E:196a-20: sems can ma lus pa'i dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu ste /
T02TD1785E:196a-21: dus thams cad du brtson zhing 'jug par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-22: sems can gyi khams rnams kun nas bzang zhing dge ba thob par mdzad pas na kun du bzang po ste /
T02TD1785E:196a-23: bdag la dgyes shing rol par mdzod cig pa ste /
T02TD1785E:196a-24: gzhan dag ni bshad zin to //
T02TD1785E:196a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje ni don yod par grub pa'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-26: de'i btsun mo ni 'phags ma sgrol ma ste /
T02TD1785E:196a-27: rdo rje 'chang chen po rang bzhin brgya drug cu'i rnam pa'i spyod pa 'gags shing /
T02TD1785E:196a-28: ye shes kyi gnyid kyis thams cad stong par bzhugs pa la bltas te skul bar byed pa'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-29: khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:196a-30: don yod par grub pa'i sgo nas bod pa ste /
T02TD1785E:196a-31: rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor ba las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis zhe sdang la spyod pa la sogs pa'i sems can gyi khams rnam par spyong bas na rdo rje 'dod pa'o //
T02TD1785E:196a-32: las kyi rigs kyi bdag por gyur pas na dam tshig mchog go //
T02TD1785E:196b-0: 'dod @196b chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i thabs kyis byang chub rab tu stsol bas na phan don che'o //
T02TD1785E:196b-1: sh'akya'i rigs las byung ba rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pas na /
T02TD1785E:196b-2: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog go //
T02TD1785E:196b-3: yang na so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid kyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad pas na /
T02TD1785E:196b-4: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog go //
T02TD1785E:196b-5: rang dang gzhan du rnam par dbye ba'i dmigs pa dang bral ba nyid yin yang /
T02TD1785E:196b-6: sems can rnams la rjes su thugs brtse bas kun nas mnyam nyid rjes brtse ba'o //
T02TD1785E:196b-7: de lta bu'i khyad par can gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i yon tan gyi rin po che mang po'i gter du gyur pas /
T02TD1785E:196b-8: bdag la dgyes shing bsten par mdzod cig pa ste /
T02TD1785E:196b-9: gang gi phyir 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar ma dang /
T02TD1785E:196b-10: 'od gsal ba'i ye shes 'di skyed par byed pa'o zhes bdag nyid bstod par byed pa'o //
T02TD1785E:196b-11: mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na //
T02TD1785E:196b-13: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa'i thabs kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang srog rtsol bas gson par mdzod cig ces bya bar dgongs so//
T02TD1785E:196b-14: de ltar tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i rang bzhin lha mo rnams kyis yang dag par bskul bar gyur pa dang /
T02TD1785E:196b-15: sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyun gyi shugs kyis stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor las bzhengs nas /
T02TD1785E:196b-16: dpal shin tu dga' ba'i bde bas 'dod chags la spyod par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:196b-17: 'khyud pa dang 'o byed pa dang 'jib pa dang thal mo brdab pa dang so dang sen mos 'debs pa dang nyed pa dang khyud lding dang /
T02TD1785E:196b-19: grong gi bya bas mu tig gi phreng ba dang gdu bu dang 'khor gdub dang /
T02TD1785E:196b-20: rkang gdub kyi sgra dang yul dang dbang po ste /
T02TD1785E:196b-21: rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor zhing /
T02TD1785E:196b-22: shes rab dang thabs kyi snyoms par zhugs pas /
T02TD1785E:196b-23: a'a li dang k'a li ste 'dod pa'i gdugs dang rus sbal dang zla ba gang ba ste /
T02TD1785E:196b-24: rtsa sbubs gsum sor mo gsum gyis bskyod cing /
T02TD1785E:197a-0: rab tu bskul ba'i dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgras mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba @197a * //
T02TD1785E:197a-2: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid spyi bo nas brtsams te /
T02TD1785E:197a-3: dri ma med pa'i char gyi rgyun bzhin du bzhus la byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid du 'dzag pas /
T02TD1785E:197a-4: chos 'byung ba'i nad du yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02TD1785E:197a-5: des 'dod chags la sogs pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams rnam par sbyangs nas /
T02TD1785E:197a-7: slar yang 'od gsal bar zhugs nas rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du gyur to //
T02TD1785E:197a-8: don 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:197a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD1785E:197a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:197a-11: 'dod chags thams cad ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams so //
T02TD1785E:197a-12: de rnams la longs spyod pa ni rang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas mig la sogs pa dang mnyam par sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1785E:197a-13: de'i dpal ni mnyam pa nyid de /
T02TD1785E:197a-14: kun du dga' ba'i bde ba'i gnas skabs so //
T02TD1785E:197a-15: ting nge 'dzin gang la de skad ces bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs pa ni brnyes pa'o //
T02TD1785E:197a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag po ste /
T02TD1785E:197a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag ni spyan la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:197a-18: dam tshig gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:197a-19: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'dod pa spyod cing rol par mdzad nas mi gsung bar gyur pa ste /
T02TD1785E:197a-20: ston pa la sogs pa'i bya ba dang bral zhing ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD1785E:197a-21: lhan cig snyoms par zhugs nas bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD1785E:197a-22: de nas zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi phyag rgya la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'og tu'o //
T02TD1785E:197a-23: nam mkha'i dbyings 'di dag thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ste /
T02TD1785E:197a-24: bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar gnas par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:197b-0: nam @197b mkha'i gtos 'di rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid rdo rje gsum dang yang dag par ldan pa /
T02TD1785E:197b-1: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhing til gyi gang bu bzhin du bar mtshams med par gyur la /
T02TD1785E:197b-2: bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar zhes pa /
T02TD1785E:197b-3: mchog tu dga' ba'i bum pa bzhin du gnas shing mi g-yo bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02TD1785E:197b-4: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi snyoms par zhugs pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:197b-5: de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku gsum gyi dam tshig las yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje dpal gyis reg nas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur to zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:197b-7: rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings ni khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can rnams so //
T02TD1785E:197b-8: sku gsum las yang dag par byung ba ni rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02TD1785E:197b-9: rdo rje dpal gyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:197b-10: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dpal gyis te bde bas reg cing yul du byas pas thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid thob pa'o //
T02TD1785E:197b-11: rdo rje gsum ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
T02TD1785E:197b-12: de'i ye shes ni stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:197b-14: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:197b-15: rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis dbang bskur brtsams nas te /
T02TD1785E:197b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbang bskur bar gyur nas /
T02TD1785E:197b-17: kun du bzang po zhes sngon ma byung ba'i don gyi ming can du gyur to //
T02TD1785E:197b-18: de ltar sems can thams cad ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas /
T02TD1785E:197b-19: sems can mnyam pa nyid du bstan pas ji ltar smra bar gyur pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:197b-20: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas /
T02TD1785E:197b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD1785E:197b-22: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam /
T02TD1785E:198a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis @198a * //
T02TD1785E:198a-1: phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1785E:198a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so //
T02TD1785E:198a-3: bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:198a-4: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
T02TD1785E:198a-5: de'i rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa ni rang gi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba nyams su myong ba nyid kyi /
T02TD1785E:198a-6: sems can thams cad kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba bdag gir mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:198a-7: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje ye shes kyi spyod pa nyams su myong bar mdzad nas /
T02TD1785E:198a-8: yang snyoms par 'jug pa las bzhengs nas /
T02TD1785E:198a-9: ji ltar thugs rab tu dgyes par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gsol pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:198a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i bha ga las mngon par byung nas /
T02TD1785E:198a-11: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD1785E:198a-12: gang 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs par bya ba de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to //
T02TD1785E:198a-13: bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:198a-14: gang zhes bya ba ni rgyu gang gi phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:198a-15: 'dod chags kyi yi ge'i tshig ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:198a-16: 'dod chags kyi spyod pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste /
T02TD1785E:198a-17: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du rjes su chud cing thob pa gang yin pa de ngo mtshar rab tu che ba'o //
T02TD1785E:198a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi tshig thos nas /
T02TD1785E:198a-19: de rnams kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa bstan pas /
T02TD1785E:198a-20: ji ltar som nyi med par mdzad pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:198a-21: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos /
T02TD1785E:198a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:198a-23: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad ma zer cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD1785E:198a-24: chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:198a-25: gzugs kyi phung po ma yin /
T02TD1785E:198a-26: tshor ba'i phung po ma yin /
T02TD1785E:198b-5: chos ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:198b-6: nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa ste /
T02TD1785E:198b-7: chos thams cad de dang mnyam pa'i phyir de skad ces ma zer cig ces the tshom med par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD1785E:198b-8: gzugs kyi phung po ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02TD1785E:198b-9: don 'di nyid spros nas ston pa ma yin no //
T02TD1785E:198b-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:198b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad 'od gsal ba nyid du gsungs pa'i tshig gi rjes thogs nyid la mngon sum du byas nas brjod du med pa'i chos nyid de nyid la bsgom zhing bzhugs par gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i tshig gi don yin no //
T02TD1785E:198b-12: de ltar gsang ba bstan pa yongs su rdzogs nas /
T02TD1785E:198b-13: des 'dul ba'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la /
T02TD1785E:198b-14: ji ltar yongs su gtad par mdzad pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:198b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes /
T02TD1785E:198b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1785E:198b-17: khyed rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du /
T02TD1785E:198b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD1785E:198b-19: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sal ba yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:198b-20: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di bsgo bar gyis shig ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1785E:198b-21: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gnyis dang /
T02TD1785E:198b-22: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'o //
T02TD1785E:198b-23: de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can 'dod chags las byung ba'i byang chub kyi gnas thob pa la snod du gyur pa'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:198b-24: de ltar skal ba yod pa nyid yin no //
T02TD1785E:198b-25: de ltar yul la chags pa'i sems can rnams rgyud 'di'i snod du gyur par bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:198b-26: ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:199a-1: gtad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:199a-2: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1785E:199a-3: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid 'di zung shig / khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1785E:199a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas cang mi smra bar gyur to zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:199a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de /
T02TD1785E:199a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs pa /
T02TD1785E:199a-8: 'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang chen /
T02TD1785E:199a-9: gsang ba 'dus pa'i tshul 'di de ltar ngas bshad pa khyod kyis yid la zhog la zung zhig /
T02TD1785E:199a-10: gang gi phyir rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa /
T02TD1785E:199a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzhung du byas pa'i bstan pa'i chos thams cad de /
T02TD1785E:199a-12: chos de rnams la spobs pa dpag tu med pas na dbang phyug ste /
T02TD1785E:199a-13: gtso bor dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba ste /
T02TD1785E:199a-14: bstan pa 'di dag la ni gsung gi rdo rje gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:199a-15: sems can chen po cang mi smra bar gyur pa ni /
T02TD1785E:199a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ji lta ba bzhin du khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1785E:199a-17: rgyud gtad pa'i 'og tu brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02TD1785E:199a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs zhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02TD1785E:199a-20: rigs lnga dang ldan pa'i sprul pa'i sku dpag tu med cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD1785E:199a-21: khro bo'i rgyal po la sogs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1785E:199a-22: 'od dpag tu med pa dang mi bskyod pa nyid thob par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD1785E:199b-0: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ni khams @199b gsum pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid du ji ltar gyur pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:199b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1785E:199b-2: srid pa gsum gyi gnas 'di na sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa'i sems can mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i tshogs rnams kyi lus gang yin pa de ni rnam par snang mdzad do zhes bya ba 'di'i don ni khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing zhes bya ba 'dis ston to //
T02TD1785E:199b-3: lus dang rnam par snang mdzad ni rten dang brten pa nyid du med cing de bzhin du rdzogs pa dag ma rdzogs pa'i lus ngag ni dbyer med par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:199b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma lta bu la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to //
T02TD1785E:199b-5: de bzhin du khams gsum pa'i sems can thams cad kyi ngag gang yin pa de ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1785E:199b-6: de nas gsung rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing zhes bya bas bstan to //
T02TD1785E:199b-7: de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems gang yin pa de ni mi bskyod pa'o zhes bya ba'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1785E:199b-8: de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi sems rdo rje la gnas shing zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gis ston to //
T02TD1785E:199b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gang yin pa dang /
T02TD1785E:199b-10: sems can thams cad kyi sems gang yin pa gcig pa nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1785E:199b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid du gyur pas /
T02TD1785E:199b-12: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med cing gcig pa nyid la dmigs par mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to zhes mthar thug pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD1785E:199b-13: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin gyis rgyud kyi don dang /
T02TD1785E:199b-14: tshul dang chos nyid la som nyi dang bral mod kyi /
T02TD1785E:199b-15: som nyi gzhan 'ga' zhig bdag la yod de /
T02TD1785E:199b-16: mtha' drug gis bshad pa rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i sngags pa rnams sgra ji bzhin du gsungs pa'i tshig la brten te /
T02TD1785E:200a-0: rang gi slob dpon gyi man ngag gis mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim @200a * //
T02TD1785E:200a-2: zla ba dang rdo rje'i rim pa'am /
T02TD1785E:200a-3: srid pa 'byung ba'i rim gyis yongs su brtags pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor la slob pa dag yongs su dag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor yang rtogs pa thams cad las 'das pa so so rang gis rig pa /
T02TD1785E:200a-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul phung po rin po che'i za ma tog gi nad na gnas pa /
T02TD1785E:200a-5: yod pa dang med pa'i phyogs dang bral ba /
T02TD1785E:200a-6: yi ge'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /
T02TD1785E:200a-7: rtog ge pa rnams kyi yul ma yin pa /
T02TD1785E:200a-8: bla ma'i man ngag 'ba' zhig las shes par bya ba ste /
T02TD1785E:200a-9: 'di lta bu'i lha'i de kho na nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing /
T02TD1785E:200a-10: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa sdud pa po rnams kyang med par gyur pa'i phyi ma'i dus na /
T02TD1785E:200a-11: sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par bshad pa 'di rgyun mi 'chad par su zhig ston par 'gyur /
T02TD1785E:200a-12: gdul bya'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur /
T02TD1785E:200a-14: ma 'ongs pa'i don 'di ni lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
T02TD1785E:200a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa de 'dir bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1785E:200a-16: rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pa //
T02TD1785E:200a-17: so so rang rig ye shes ni //
T02TD1785E:200a-18: phyi ma'i dus su gyur pa na //
T02TD1785E:200a-21: bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og / dus dag 'das nas 'byung ba ni //
T02TD1785E:200a-23: blo gros chen po khyod shes byos //
T02TD1785E:200a-24: lho phyogs bhe ta'i yul du ni //
T02TD1785E:200a-25: dge slong dpal ldan zhes bya ba //
T02TD1785E:200a-26: de ming klu zhes bod la ste //
T02TD1785E:200a-27: yod dang med pa'i phyogs 'dzin pa //
T02TD1785E:200a-29: bla med theg chen rab bshad nas //
T02TD1785E:200a-30: rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs te //
T02TD1785E:200a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /
T02TD1785E:200a-34: ji srid 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos gnas pa de srid kyi bar du /
T02TD1785E:200a-35: rdo rje theg pa la rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi lung la brten nas /
T02TD1785E:200a-36: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i go rims kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa rtogs par bya ba /
T02TD1785E:200a-37: slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas brtsams te gter dang 'dra bar /
T02TD1785E:200b-0: slob @200b dpon rnams brgyud pa'i rim gyis bla ma'i zhal snga nas /
T02TD1785E:200b-1: gsang ba 'dus pa rnams kyi tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i rgyud la 'jug cing 'pho'o //
T02TD1785E:200b-2: de ltar slob dpon chen po dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis nyid kyi don rjes su brnyes nas /
T02TD1785E:200b-3: so sor rang rig pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten du bstan nas /
T02TD1785E:200b-4: lha dang mi'i bde ba las 'das shing /
T02TD1785E:200b-5: mu stegs dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba las 'das nas /
T02TD1785E:200b-6: skye ba dang 'gag pa dang bral ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa /
T02TD1785E:200b-7: sku lta bas chog mi shes pa stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pas das rgyas kyi yon tan rnams kyis brgyan pa brnyes nas /
T02TD1785E:200b-8: bde ba can du gshegs te /
T02TD1785E:200b-9: yon tan gyi dbang phyug brgya dang ldan pas bzhugs so //
T02TD1785E:200b-10: de ltar lung bstan pa dang lung ma bstan pa'i rnam par rtog pa bsal la /
T02TD1785E:200b-11: ngo bo nyid shes pas 'di dang pha rol gyi mtha' nges par bya'o //
T02TD1785E:200b-12: da ni gzhung nye bar sdud par byed de /
T02TD1785E:200b-13: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
T02TD1785E:200b-14: rgyud ma lus par rgyun rnam pa bdun dang /
T02TD1785E:200b-15: bshad pa'i tshul gyis thos nas /
T02TD1785E:200b-16: don dang tshul dang chos nyid khong du chud de /
T02TD1785E:200b-17: rim pa gnyis kyi man ngag sbyin pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD1785E:200b-18: nyan pa po rnams la yang dag par bshad de brtsams pa'i don yongs su rdzogs nas /
T02TD1785E:200b-19: bdag nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par ston pa ni /
T02TD1785E:200b-20: sdud par byed pas de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba smras te /
T02TD1785E:200b-21: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di de skad ces bka' stsal pa ste /
T02TD1785E:200b-22: rdo rje 'chang chen po bde ba chen pos rab tu bstan pa'o //
T02TD1785E:200b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gtso bor byas nas zhugs pa ste /
T02TD1785E:200b-24: gang du gsang ba rnams kyi 'dus pa ni 'tshogs pas te /
T02TD1785E:200b-25: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyun gyi rgyal po der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang /
T02TD1785E:200b-26: sngon pa rdo brje byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ba la /
T02TD1785E:201a-1: pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1785E:201a-2: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni nyams su blang ba'i don bsrung ba la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02TD1785E:201a-3: sdom pa ni nan tan du bsgrub pa ste /
T02TD1785E:201a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02TD1785E:201a-5: de ni gnyis su med cing 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas na rdo rje'o //
T02TD1785E:201a-6: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyal po rdo rje ni 'chang chen po rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:201a-7: thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang po'i sangs rgyas /
T02TD1785E:201a-8: rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs /
T02TD1785E:201a-10: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:201a-11: 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:201a-12: sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:201a-13: theg pa gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:201a-14: dus gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:201a-15: rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:201a-16: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can /
T02TD1785E:201a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs mtha' yas te /
T02TD1785E:201a-18: de ston pa'i gzhung bsdus pa ma lus pa ni /
T02TD1785E:201a-19: snga ma bzhin du gos dang 'dra ba'i phyir na le'u zhes bya'o /
T02TD1785E:201a-21: // / bde bar gshegs gsung shin tu phra ba'i rnal 'byor rgyud //
T02TD1785E:201a-22: mtha' drug bral bar nges par rtogs zhes gang smra ba //
T02TD1785E:201a-23: de ni de nyid mthong mig yi ge tsam lha ste //
T02TD1785E:201a-24: zla ba lta 'dod sor mo'i rtse la lta dang mtshungs //
T02TD1785E:201a-25: gzhan yang rgyal ba skyes mchog rnams kyis rnam par bshad pa'i mtha' drug lam gang yin //
T02TD1785E:201a-26: gang zhig 'di dang rgyud tshul ma lus rnam 'byed rgyud kyi mthar thug bshad byas pas //
T02TD1785E:201a-27: bdag gis dge ba gang thob des ni sgron 'bar rgya cher bshad 'di ring gnas shing //
T02TD1785E:201a-28: bde ba dam pa'i gnas mchog zla ba'i blo dang 'gro ba rnams ni ldan par shog / sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
T02TD1785E:201a-29: le'u bcu bdun pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
T02TD1785E:201a-31: // / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgya char bshad pa /
T02TD1785E:201a-32: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po n'a ga rdzu na'i man ngag la brten te /
T02TD1785E:201a-33: slob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1785E:201a-35: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddh'a ka ra wa rma dang /
T02TD1785E:201b-0: zhu chen gyi lo @201b ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
T02TD1785E:201b-2: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i dzny'a n'a ka ra bas bshad nas /
T02TD1785E:201b-3: bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis zhu gtugs g-yar khral 'tshal ba'o //
T02TD1785E:201b-4: yang slad kyis rgya gar gyi pandi ta chen po nag po'i zhal snga nas kyis bshad nas /
T02TD1785E:201b-5: bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang gtugs te bcos pa'o//
